1b1(mdo 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ yo g+han tAka/ bod skad 
1b2(mdo 'grel): du/ sbyor ba brgyu pa/ sangs rgyas sman gyi zla bai DUr+ya 'od kyi rgyal
1b3(mdo 'grel): brel phyag la la la// 'phags pakru sgrub la phyaga'i tshal la// 
1b4(mdo 'grel): ring du chags pa'i gas spyad nas// mtho'i las rgyud kyi gces paza 
1b5(mdo 'grel): sman pa mkhas par rab mad pa'i// sbyor ba brgya yis bcings par bya// 
2a1(mdo 'grel): bdud rtsi lta bu'i sman sbyor gyis// lus ni nad med 'gyur ba yin// gso 
2a2(mdo 'grel): dpyad shes pa'i sman pa yis// nad rgyu mtshan nyid yongs su brtag/ sle tres sla sgang byi tsher bca' sga dang / 
2a3(mdo 'grel): b+hi grA s+thA shika parbaT// b+ha s+t+ra byi tshing bcu skra/ skang rnams// bskal zang rlung mkhris bdakan 
2a4(mdo 'grel): masal byung/ sa pa na pa // bsgye pa ba rgyas / ngam / 
2a5(mdo 'grel): lung ba dbugs mi bde bcas dang ka med// gzhogs gzer nyes gsum las zung rim la'ang bsngags// 
2a6(mdo 'grel): dang garbad sman na rtsa grwa sgang dang // nying len a rur rnams bzhol ba'i thang / 
2b1(mdo 'grel): gzer bcas tshad 'khru bad rlung ldan rims la// phan no rbod skyed bzhu ba byas pas kyang // rgun 'brum gla sgang hong len a ru ra// dong ka parba ta ka'i thang byas la// mkhris byung rims dang bslab 
2b2(mdo 'grel): bcol brgyal ba dang // mgo 'khor tsha skam sgom dang ldan rnams la// kaN+Da kA ri bca' sga sle tres bskol// dro sman nar mo bsres pa'i thang 'thungs pas// gsus gzer lud pa 
2b3(mdo 'grel): tshad rnying dang ka med// pho ba'i nad chab dbugs mi bde rnams 'joms// byi tsher per pa Ta ka a ru ra// ba sha tong len tit+sa pri yaM ku// kar cher btab bskol ba'i thang 'thungs pas// 
2b4(mdo 'grel): sgom dang khrag mkhris rims dang tshad ldan 'joms// rim nad gso ba'i spyad do// skyer rtsa 'bras bu gsum dang bi shA la// skyer rtsa phye mar byas la nges par bskol// thang la sbrang rtsi ldan pa
2b5(mdo 'grel): 'thungs pa yis// gcin kha snyi ba'i nad skyes ma lus 'joms// u dI ts+ya dong ka bde bong nga dkar// gla sgang dug mo nyung bcas thang byas pa// tshad pa gzer bcas khrag 'khru dang bcas la/ 
2b6(mdo 'grel): yun ring zhugs pa'i 'khru ba rnams la phan// gla sgang bca' sga bong nga dkar por bcas// sle tres cha mnyam chu la bskol 'thungs pas// me drod zhan pa'i rgun gyi nad rnams dang // tshad zin 
2b7(mdo 'grel): 'khru ba'i nad kyang sel bar 'gyur// pags nad lto ban dang skya rbab na// spos dang cham pa bad kan mgul 'gags la// pun rna bA thang shing a ru ra// sle tres pa gcin gu gul ldan pa 
2b8(mdo 'grel): btung // bla sgang shi gru thang shing dan+ti 'bras// bi ta gro sman nar phye bcas thang gis// rgyun tu kha rkub nas 'byung srin bu dang // srin las skyes pa'i nad kyang 'joms par 'gyur// su 
3a1(mdo 'grel): dro sman shing mngang na le sham// a sma b+he dang a raM bA sha ga ze// brag zhun gtso cher bskol ba'i thang 'thungs na// rde'u gseg ma dang bcas gcir sri sel// bra ga zhun at+ma 
3a2(mdo 'grel): b+he dang suk+She dang // dro sman phye ma 'bras bkras chu btab btung // yang dbu ma dang bcas 'thungs tsam na// gcin pri 'chi la thug pa'ang 'tshe bar 'gyur// dong ka dang ni gzem a ru ra/ 
3a3(mdo 'grel): byi tsher a smai b+he ta ba sha ka/ bskol ba'i thang la sbrang rtsi ldan 'brangs na// cha zhing gzer ba cas gcin sra grol bar 'gyur// dong ka dang ni sle tres b+ha sha rams// e daN mar khul bskol thang 'thungs/ 
3a4(mdo 'grel): na// rlung byung rnam 'gyur ma lus khrag gi nang // steng 'og lus kun nas 'dzag rim pas 'joms// baN+Dal ka'i rtsa ba lig bu mig/ 'bras kyi chun la sbrang rtsi ldan 'brangs na// kun gyis bskyed 
3a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i khrag na da nges par 'joms// dbugs mi bde la b+hAr+thi bca' sgas so// bi ha ti gnyis e ra ra ka pid dang // ma tu asma k+Sha ra shing kun gze// sain+na e ra Na mar khur bsres byas thang // 
3a6(mdo 'grel): rked pa snying nu po mtshan gzer bas btung // shing kun shu dge kha ru bca' sga dang // go skod a ru puSh+ka ru rta rnams// phyi ma'i cha 'phel phye mar byas rnams kyis// lto sman rims rnying gsud nad rnams 
3a7(mdo 'grel): la'o// bca' sga shing kun ru tsacha stam byed// sga chu la bskol bad kan rlung byung dang // rtsib logs snying rgya ba gsus gzer gsung rnams la// btung ngo de bzhin nas khrus rtug 'gags la'o// 
3a8(mdo 'grel): 'jam 'bras lo ma'i bI shA lAn bya// tsi tha tshag sum lan tshwa gtso cher brtsegs// bsregs pa'i thal ba zhol sbyar 'thungs pas// dmu skran skya zab chub kyi nad rnams sel// shing kun shu dag bcal/ 
3b1(mdo 'grel): skra si rtsa ka/ khadra phyi ma nyis 'gyur phye mar byas// chu dron btab 'thungs sna tshogs gsung gzer dang // snying nad sran dang stod du rlung 'tshangs 'joms// shing hU~M tshag sum 'bras gsum kaN+Da ka 
3b2(mdo 'grel): b+hAn+ti puSh+kar+Na ShA tshwa sA lnga// bye mchu dron btab 'thungs skyigs bu lud// deng ka med chab stod rlung mi bde 'joms// dzaM bu dug nyung arga shi gru swA ha ba se shing b+hA g+hi bri ha tI// bA ri ka bed tshos shing dzar+tha/ 
3b3(mdo 'grel): a pA marga nam+bi tsi t+ta ka/ ba Sha puSh+ka rA Da la dang sin+de ldan pa bsregs thal bskol ba la// sdang bshad shing kun la sogs pa'i// mu ba lto sman padi kan nad la btu // nr-i byA skar bu tsha gsum pa sa yab 
3b4(mdo 'grel): bcas// ba wa dI ra bcugang tsirba kra// bye mcha menyam bur ba sres drigasum ldan// gri mdzor cham pad dang ka med la bsngags// ba lu tsa h+ya na ga ma mtshungs gnyis pa// dul bcwa gang drona'o 
3b5(mdo 'grel): sgragasum 'gyur// bu ram sum 'byur dri bzang ril byar mung // grang bzhi glo rims gzer ba'i gzhang 'bram sel// skra drod na le shan+da 'dab shing tsha// swak+She mtha' rims gang 'phel bye mang 
3b6(mdo 'grel): 'di dag ca 'ja'i gang 'gas gzhan med zhar// dbugs dang mi bde sman mgul snying nad la'o// sid+d+ha shing kun 'bras gsum la la phung // chag sum bu ma na rnams ril bur byas/ 
3b7(mdo 'grel): de rnams mur zhing myangs pas che mthob cing // madrod zhan las rab tu zung ba'ang sel// lugs phye tshag sum cu shug cha thams cad// mATI bye ma dang mnyam de rnams 
3b8(mdo 'grel): bza'// can 'brum ldan pa'i rjes su dang 'thungs pas// t+ya rbab nad la phan zhing ring du 'gro// bur ma ldan pa'i bca' grwa'i drod sman nang // gsum pa a rung 'amabal po'i sarba/ 
4a1(mdo 'grel): bad kan tshad snying gzhang 'bru ma nad rnams dang // rtug pa 'gags pa rnams la'ang rtag tubya// bca' sga gra sgang a ru dbye la// bu ram ldan pa la ni ril bu bya// lud pa dbugs 
4a2(mdo 'grel): mi bde dang tsho ches rnams// 'aru ril bu mur bas bzlog par 'gyur// n+ya zo ut+pal ru d+hu ma TI ka/ phye ma 'bras che bcas pa ril bu b+ha// sru ba kha ru mur bas skom dad dang // rab tu 
4a3(mdo 'grel): 'phel bamyur du 'joms par 'gyur// sdong ros rbod sman nar mon le sham// phye ma ka paing+ga sbyar khu bar ldan// 'bras byen mnyam ma kr-i ka bsres pa'i// bus pas lan gcig ma yin 
4a4(mdo 'grel): sdug pa 'ams// sna zag 'jig la dra \u0f7f'i 'ba'am// bal sa me tog sbyar nges par bstan// bud ma na na skyugs zla ba'am// d+hI maT+Tigs kyang mi gu 'dzams/ 
4a5(mdo 'grel): skyu ru spos dkar khu ba kha ru tsha// de rnams bsres pa so ba ril btags// des 'dir myung bar gzhi nas med byed cing // dzaM lta'i skyigs bu slar mi 'byung ba yin// durba sin+d+ha thal ka ya ru ra/ 
4a6(mdo 'grel): thi ra k+Sha kany+dzi ka dang btags// gsum pas byug pa 'am nu ma'i 'og btags pas// shu ba dang ni g.yan pa rnam par 'joms// swA ha tsitra b+h+ri ga aH dang // mya ngan med shun ru rba tshwa ba gcan/ 
4a7(mdo 'grel): bcos pa'i mar khras shu ba mdze glang shu// gdug pa'i rma dang za 'brum ser kha 'phrog/ gu gul mig sman pra tshil sin+d+hur// pad mcha mnyam tsha ba'i mar lus bco// khyi rdo za tsag gis ni 
4a8(mdo 'grel): lus skams la// lan cig zugs pa'i nus pa gzhi nas 'don// bu brtsi kA ru na marba skra// rgya skyegs dang ni brtsod pa dang yung ba rnams// drug 'gyur dar ba la bskol grub pa ra/ 
4b1(mdo 'grel): byugs pas grang dang tsha ba'i rims 'joms so// kaN+Da kA ri s+kha tres bA sha ka/ phye mar zhun mar la bskol grub pa de// 'thungs pas tshad rnying lud gzer dbugs mi bde// me drod 
4b2(mdo 'grel): zhan pa'i pho ba'i nang la pan// bA sha seng ldeng ba Do la pa tra// nim+ba shing tshwa sle rjes tam la// ki bye mar sar la bskol myur grub na// med dbal mkhris bskran mdze las brgyal bar 
4b3(mdo 'grel): 'gyur// drug pas khrag dang bcas pa brgya yi skyon// rab 'khrugs las skyes yan lag las kuran gzer// bye brag me dpal chang gis ra rog// rmongs pa chang 'thungs las skyes 
4b4(mdo 'grel): rnam 'gyur la// kaR+Sha kA ri nim+ba pa tol// sle tres 'bras gsum 'jam 'bras ba shaka/ bye chung ra rnying la ni tshogs gtso// myung du grub 'dis mdze las myur du rgyal// kar ku sh+maN+Tha/ 
4b5(mdo 'grel): cho ga bzhin du bcos skams nas// par bskol kar btab tsha gsum zir ldan par btso// 'di bskor byis rgan khrag 'dzag rlung 'joms bud med la bod cing // zas skom lung khrag mab+his 
4b6(mdo 'grel): skyugs dbugs mi bde dang gzhang 'brum 'joms// ba ga tsir s+tha ru ma kI ka dro spar// 'du ba son du ba dan+ti dang // rurta rnams btsi rang bu mthe bong 'dra// mar bskus rkub bcug de yi nad 'brog byed 
4b7(mdo 'grel): lus gso ba'i dpyad rdzogs so// / ka bcas gung dgum ma'am mngal bcos// tshi ga bzhin rlung zhag las byung ba'o// smin pa mu 'gram na mig pago ba yai// byed gzer 
4b8(mdo 'grel): 'khor las byung nas 'joms so// a ru ba ru s+yA ru nang sa bon// su pa gnyis gcig gi cha rnams zhol btags// mig sman di yis mchi ma mang 'byung zhing // mig tsha rab tu 'jug pa'ang 
5a1(mdo 'grel): 'joms par 'gyur// a ru siR+ShA ba dang lag bu mig/ bcag yug dang bcas tshul bsres btags te// mig gi phyi rol rab tu byugs byas pas// 'di yis/ 
5a2(mdo 'grel): mig gis nad kun zhi bar 'gyur// so b+hA la sain+na ser po ma btags// de nas mar btsos ras dkar po la btsags// de yis mig la byug b+h+yas mkhris bskyed nad// dmar tshig dang 
5a3(mdo 'grel): ni sha mdzang nges par 'joms// zag bskyed dka raM rgya mtsho'i sbubs 'joms// babyung gro sman nar mo srong long la'o// lug mig tsha ba gsum gyis mig 'gribs la// ling tog dkar 
5a4(mdo 'grel): lam k+Sha snad rtsis so// nag tshur leg sog dkar bcas rgya mtsho'i sku// nal sham sa ma kha san+ta btsag yug dang // sdong ngos cha mnyam pa TI ka bsres btags// rab ri bakhrus bskyedaH/ 
5a5(mdo 'grel): nad chag po 'joms// sle dras pra shel lcags phye dug nyung nal sha san+d+hi karnal// lig mig rdo dreg spang spos yung ba spang ma sang sa rgya mtsho'i lha// mtshungs pa phye ma lcags sdod du bzhag sta 
5a6(mdo 'grel): rje ldan pas sha mdzer dang // rab rib ling tog khrag 'brir mig sha'i nad la nye bar byug pa'ang bsngags// shing mdar ut+pal rgya mtsho'i sgrub shing tshe pra shel gi hang btsod// sprang pos tsan danas 
5a7(mdo 'grel): bcag yug ba lu lig mig nag chung gdab// de ltar thams cad cha mnyam mig sman 'di yis mig 'brum mig nag tsa// mchi khrag skya rib mig shag zer nad 'phrog la bsngags pas rtag tu byug 
5a8(mdo 'grel): mig gi sman dpyad rdzogs so// / thang shing bong dang dkar po sle thes bcas// dug nyung tor len ma nu pA tha'i thang // ba gcin la grub sbrang rtsi dang ldan pa// mgrin pa'i nad dang kun la 
5b1(mdo 'grel): btung bar bya// kA ra te dza ba ta pa thA dang // lig mig skyer rtsa yung bgro sman nar// ril bu sbrang rtsil byas kha nang du// mur bar bya'o mgrin pa'i nang kun la// skyer rtsa gla sgang dzA ti'i me 
5b2(mdo 'grel): tog gi/ log sar rgan 'brum dug nyung 'bras gsum bskol// sbrang rtsi ldan pas lus kyi kha sgo'i nang // lce yi nad rnams dus su zhi bar byed// ru rta dang ni skyer pa'i rtsa ba seng phrom btsod/ 
5b3(mdo 'grel): yud snod gla skar pA bA te dza ni// zhi ba btags so rnams ldeg par byed pa dang // gzer zhing 'khrug la nad khrag 'byin par byed// sau bI ra tsukra sge'u gsher ma tu// khu ba sha rnams gu gul sain+d+hu rnams// 
5b4(mdo 'grel): gang zhig Na ba'i mar gul bskol te// rna bar blug pas rna ba'i zug rngu sel// ba sha ni mA pa rdol parba ta ka pe tsa bya snyed rtsa dang // kla skad ta~Mt+ta pupra shel gyi tshor tshagasum tra in+tak+Shatsan dan rnams// tsun 
5b5(mdo 'grel): mar la grub steng 'og nas skyes rnam 'gyur sna dang mig gi gzer la sogs// pags nad rims dang khong 'bras rma yaM zug rngu mig nad skya rib rnams la bsngags// skyer tsa drug nyung nim+ba parba Ta dang ro sman 
5b6(mdo 'grel): kyigyi tsher shing mngar dang // tha yan+ti tong 'bras gsum tik+ta brisha pa krol dang gla sgang mngar// de rnams bye mar bskol ba zhun mar la grub 'di ni mig la phan pa yin// mkhris pa khrag las byung dang skya ri ba rab 
5b7(mdo 'grel): rib rnams dang stod kyi nad rnams la// eraHdkar po'i rtsa ba dang ni shu dag dang // sha ta buSh+pa bri ta ti'i 'bras bu gzhan yang // ta khar yi mar bu 'o mar bcas las grub// rab rib stod dang gtso che'i nad dang 
5b8(mdo 'grel): gnan pa'ang 'joms// zug rngu zad par byed pa gnyis pa rdzogs so// / dung dang mu ka ka dag me lces bsregs pa'i thal ba sdod du thug par byas te// de nyid sur tshul btso zhing bskol ba'i thal 
6a1(mdo 'grel): kar brgyad cha nA ga ge sar me tog cha bzhis lde gus kun tu longs sprod cing // phun sum tshogs bya sha za rims dang dug gi nad rnams 'joms 'gyur zla ba shar ba lta bur grags// dug nad sel ba'i rgyud
6a2(mdo 'grel): rdzogs so// !// yungs dkar 'bras gsum shi ri Sha ko tra b+hI shwe 'jam 'bras sle tres dang // btsong dang ser po gnyis dang tsha ba gsum dang spang spos shu dag shing kun rnams// ra i gcin la 
6a3(mdo 'grel): btags byas 'thung sogs sten pas sbrul gyis sos btab gdon kun dang // gshed byed smyo byed sha za dang ni srin po 'joms shing brlag par byed par 'gyur// karba sa'i rus pa dang ni rma bya'i 'dab ma 
6a4(mdo 'grel): bri ha hi rnams dang // ni rma l+ya po son cha shing tsha nu gang byi la'i brtug pa bA sha kA dang ke sha sbrul lpags dang // glang po'i so dang shri ka shing kun nal shaM dkar po cha mnyam bdug byas pas// gshed byed smyo byed sha za/ 
6a5(mdo 'grel): srin po lha rnams zhugs pa'i rims ni 'joms par dran// tsha ba gsum dang da la gur gum rdo sman nar mo'i rtsa ba kA ra si hi yung ba ru rta nyung kar gnyis dang am+bu dug nyung sgog skya 'bras bug suM dang pu shel tse dang hong 
6a6(mdo 'grel): len shu tag spangs ma shing mngar pA la dmar po ldong ros shug pa zhes grags pa// darti rgya spos ma d+hu ka sA pri yaM ku dang bo dang dkar po lig bu mig dang tsa bya thang shing bcas pa phye mar byas pa mar dang srog chags 
6a7(mdo 'grel): brgyad kyi gcin gyi cha la bskol ba bshad 'thungs pas 'byung po 'bros shing de yi gdon rnams mchog tu 'joms par 'gyur// rgya spos shing mngar 'jam 'bras rgya skyegs pa Do la'i lo ma rak+ta pa Di kA shu dag pa thal 
6a8(mdo 'grel): dang shing kun yungs kar si hi ser gnyis la tA hong len dang // po son chagasum k+Sha kaN+Da thang shing bi taM a dza g+han+t+ra ma rA// arko Da dang koN+Do k+Shi na shaMn mra sle tres drug mo nyung // ru rta shu ka ta ru praSh+pa pA la shing mngar a pa 
6b1(mdo 'grel): kar brgyad cha nA ga ge sar me tog cha bzhis lde gus kun tu longs spyod cing // phun sum tshogs bya sha za rims dang dug gi nad rnams 'joms 'gyur zla ba shar ba lta bur grags// dug nad sel ba'i rgyud
6b2(mdo 'grel): rdzogs so// // / yungs dkar 'bras gsum shi ri Sha ko tra b+hI shwe 'jam 'bras sle bres dang // btsong dang ser po gnyis dang tsha ba gsum dang spang spos shu dag shing kun rnams// ra i gcin la 
6b3(mdo 'grel): btags byas 'thung sogs sten pas sbrul gyis sos btab gdon kun dang // gshed byed smyo byed sha za dang ni srin po 'joms shing brlag par byed par 'gyur// karba sa'i rus pa dang ni rma bya'i 'dab ma 
6b4(mdo 'grel): bri ha hi rnams dang // ni rma lnga po son cha shing tsha nu gang byi la'i bcug pa bA sha k+Sha dang ke sha sbrul lpags dang // glang po'i so dang shri ka shing kun nal she dkar po cha mnyam bdug byas pas// gshed byed smyo byed shaH 
6b5(mdo 'grel): srin po lha rnams zhugs pa'i rims ni 'joms par dran// tsha ba gsum dang da la gur gum dro sman nar mo'i rtsa bak+ta ra si hi yung ba ru rta nyung kar gnyis dang am+bu dug nyung sgog skya 'bras bu ga suM dang pu shel tse dang hong 
6b6(mdo 'grel): len shu tag spangs ma shing mngar pA la dmar po ldong ros shug pa zhes grags pa// darti rgya spos ma d+hu ka sA pri yaM ku da bo nga dkar po lig bu mig dang tsa bya thang shing bcas pa phye mar byas pa mar dang srog chags 
6b7(mdo 'grel): brgyad kyi gcin gyi cha la bskol ba bshad 'thungs pas 'byung po 'bros shing de yi gdon rnams mchog tu 'joms par 'gyur// rgya spos shing mngar 'jam 'bras rgya skyegs pa ro la'i lo ma rak+ta pa Di kA shu dag pa tral 
6b8(mdo 'grel): dang shing kun yungs kar si hi ser gnyis la tA hong len dang // po son cha gsum kA kaN+Da thang shing bi taM a dza g+han+t+ra ma rA// arko Da dang koN+Do k+Shi na shaMnam+ba sle tres drag mo nyung // ru rta shu ka ta ru praSh+pa bA la shing mngar a pa 
7a1(mdo 'grel): ra dzi ta// dan+ti tsi tra ka ped cha mnyam phye ba gcin gyi sde dang mar la bskol// yun ring du bzhag kun gyi rim par sbyor bas myur du 'joms par 'gyur ba yin// 'byung po chen po'i 
7a2(mdo 'grel): gdon kun dang ni smyo byed des byas mdze rims zhi bar bshad// 'byung po zhi bar byed pa'i rgyud lnga pa rdzogs so// // skyer yungs drug mo nyung gi sa bon dang // si hi dang ni shing mngang cha mnyam po// 
7a3(mdo 'grel): de rnams thang byas bu chung ma yi ni// bu nad dang ni 'khru ba kun la pan// ka bed puSh+pad+hA ta ka dza la// seng phro ma dang bcas ga dza po bA lI// thang la mA k+Shi ka bsres byug pa dang // 'khru ba rnams la byis pa la 
7a4(mdo 'grel): sbyar bya// shri gA dron bo dang dkar po phye mar byas// go rim stug pa'i nad rnams 'joms pa la// mAk+Shi ka bcas bong dkar de bzhin gcig/ byis pa'i nad sel ba'i rgyud drug pa rdzogs so// 
7a5(mdo 'grel): skyu ru ra phye drug cu rtsa bzhi'i srang la rang gi khu bsgos sbrang rtsi mar dang tshe mnyam zhing // drod sman nar mo srang brgyad kar nyis 'gyur cha ldan thal ba'i phung po'i nang du bzhag par bya// dbyar gyi mtha' ru de brten skra dkar
7a6(mdo 'grel): dang bral gzugs dang kha dog dang ni spobs pa dang ldan zhing // nad med blo dang yid gzhungs dran pa tshig bsal stobs dang ldan zhing sems stobs ldan par 'gyur ba yin// shing mngar dang ni sbrang rtsi mar dang ni// 
7a7(mdo 'grel): lo ma dang sbyar rjes su bsten pa yis// lus po rgyag pa rab tu thob gyur nas// dga' zhing 'khrig pa yang yang nus par 'gyur// shing mngar bcu gang sain+d+hu drod sman nar// ka ra dang ni 'bras bu gsum rab 
7a8(mdo 'grel): ldan// tshe sbyin ro tsa shin tu yid bzhungs shing // rgas dang nad rnams rnam par 'joms par 'gyur// gzem skyu ru sle tres bye mar byas// sbrang rtsi mar dang ldan pa bsten pa yis// ro tsa brtan zhing sdug bsnga 
7b1(mdo 'grel): rnam 'gyur zhing // skra gnag tshe lo brgyar ni 'tsho bar 'gyur// nim+ba'i mar khu rang bzhin gnas byas pa// cho ga ji lta ba bzhin btung ba dang // 'o ma mar dang rab sbyar de zla bas// sgra dkar dang ni rgas pa rnam par 
7b2(mdo 'grel): 'byin// gze mak+Shu ra dang rtsa ba bcu bAn rA nA gA bA la ba lnga// bye ma'o thug byas 'di btung bar bya// de yis 'khrig pa lan brgyar nus pa yin// rta ltar byed pa bdun pa rdzogs so// 
7b3(mdo 'grel): shing mngar zang sgo la sain+na pa ldan zhing // dug nyung dronar po son phye mar bsre// sbrang rtsi bcas pa 'di dag smon la sbyang// mgrin nad kha dang gre 'gags nad rnams la// sau bI ra la a rur thang bskol// dronar a 
7b4(mdo 'grel): ru dan+ti bye phye ldan// e ra mar khu dang bcas 'khrul de// bshal gyi sbyor bas nad rnams 'joms par 'gyur// ra sna po son cha dang 'bras gsum sle tres rtsa ba bcu dang bA lA dang // mar khu sin+d+ra ba bcas pa la ma 
7b5(mdo 'grel): saM bcom ldan sbrang rtsi bur ram bcas// sha ta puSh+pa sle tres ru r+ha ka be ti pri yaM ku dang dro sman nar// shu dag phye ma kany+dzi ba 'o gcin bcas ma btang rlung nad rnams la phan// ba la phye ma mar khul bskol dri bzang dang / 
7b6(mdo 'grel): bcud grub pa dang 'o mazho dang sgyu chu rnams// de bzhin sa hA tsaR+Shas+yA sle tres dang // ba ri re rang bskol bas rlung 'joms so// sbyar bar bya'o bca' sga'am bu dam la// yang na sin+ta ba bcas dron la'o// smra ba 'jim 
7b7(mdo 'grel): pa 'gram pa dpung ba dang // rgyab dang mgo mig mgul 'gags nad rnams la// las lnga'i le'u brgyad pa rdzogs so// / rims la gtso char barba pa Ta ka sbyar bya skom dang che li skyu ru ra dang skyug pa la// che ba lnga 
7b8(mdo 'grel): skyes gzer la 'jam rtsi rengs la gi ri dza dang gcin sti skyu ru ra yi bubs so// rlung gi nad la rA sA dmu rdzing mcher ba'i nad la ba gcin cham pa la// dronar 'phyo la bi ti dug la shu karta ru skrangs la gu gul lo// 
8a1(mdo 'grel): ba sha ka yis thag mkhris dug nyung gis// 'khrul 'o bsre shing he mi lci gzer la// spos la thang shing srin na byi taM kas// skya rbab a rur dang 'bru gzhan gyis zas byed nad la 'bras bu gsum 
8a2(mdo 'grel): bshad gzer ba kun la de ltar khu bas so// mdzel rtag tu seng ldeng khub klo la kan+ta ka ri dang // tshigs nad gze ma mur gshed byed nA ga bA la ba las so// bcud len kun la skyu ru lha bcas gdon// nad la brag zhun bshad 
8a3(mdo 'grel): rgyud phyi ma'o// // rab tu grub pa'i sbyor ba'i cho ga rdzogs par byas// grub pa'i don rnams rtogs pa'i sman pa mkhas rnams kyis// rtog pa'i sman pa med par su yi sa sbyor ba mthong // 'di don slar yang 'dir ni 
8a4(mdo 'grel): cung zad bshad par bya// shugs bkagam zos gnyid chag skad ches rtsol ba drags// bzhon pa la zhon tsha ba khab ska rtsub pa rnams// sems bzung 'khrig dang 'jigs dang bsrung gnas mya ngan drangs// 
8a5(mdo 'grel): dbyar gyi dus su rlung ni rab tu 'khrug par 'gyur// tsha skur chang dang lan tshwa rdo dro til mar bu// khro dang gdung ba lo ma skam po 'jigs ngal rnams// thal sman la sogs ma zhum 'phrod zas zos pa// ston gyi dus su 
8a6(mdo 'grel): mkhris pa rab tu 'khrugs par 'gyur// nyin gnyid mngar dang grangs ches nya sha lci ba dang // shing tog 'o ma bu ram shing gi rnam 'gyur rnams// snam bag 'grangs ches zos dang lan tshwa bur chu rnams// dpyid kyi
8a7(mdo 'grel): dus su bad kan rab tu 'khrugs par 'gyur// de ltar 'di rnams rim pas bye brag skyon// bdug pa kun ni ldan pa brgyad du shes// sna tshogs nad ni lus kyi grangs bzhin du// ming rnams ma lus rjes su rtogs 
8a8(mdo 'grel): par bya// rtsub 'khums 'pho zhing gzer dang sngo bsangs mdog/ yan lag zug che yan lag brkyang bskum byed// shes rmong grang zhing rtsong la sgom pa rnams// rlung gi las su mkhas pas rab tu bstan// 'dzag cing 
8b1(mdo 'grel): rdul 'byung tsha zhing 'dod chags skye// dri nga rnam dang 'ju dang khro ba dang // bslab bcol brgyal dang mgo 'khor lus mdog ser // mkhris pa'i las su mkhas pas rab tu bstan// kha mig sna chu 
8b2(mdo 'grel): grong lci lus g.ya' rdul// shes pa rmongs shing sna tshogs 'gags pa dang // tsho ches mchil snams yun ring 'byung byed rnams// bad kan las su mkhas pas rab tu bstan// de rnams kyis
8b3(mdo 'grel): byas 'di dag rtogs rnams ni// nad kun ming ni du ma'i rnam pa'ang // bye brag kha cig skye ba'i dbang gis 'gyur// gang gi 'di rnams ming gzhan kun tu 'gro// rgyud ni le lo yid ni rnam ma dag/ skyon ni rab 
8b4(mdo 'grel): 'jug bkres dang gcin yang 'byung // gsus lce shis pa rmongs shing dang ga med// de rnams nad ldan de la nad 'byung 'gyur// bcud dang drod dang brtan dang re ci stobs bskyed la na tsham ngar sbyar mar 
8b5(mdo 'grel): khu dang // khrus dang drod bsten mas btang sha dang bsten yan lag kun la dril phyis dang // snam gyi dugs dang 'jam rtsis zhi byas bsku byug nye bar bsten pa la sogs pa// bza' dang btung ba gnas
8b6(mdo 'grel): dang sman 'di rnams kyis rlung na rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// kha mngar bskab grang dang rlung yab mtshan mo zla ba'i gzer la gnas pa dang // sa yi khang pa chu yi 'khrul 'khor chu la brtse zhing bud med lus la reg/ 
8b7(mdo 'grel): mar sa ra k+Shi ra dang por lus la bkru sman dang ni khrag gi gtar spang bya// bza' dang btung ba gnas dang sman 'di rnams kyis mkhris pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// rtsub dang k+Sha ra bska kha tsha ba dang ni 'bad rtsol drag dang 
8b8(mdo 'grel): ngar snabs sbrang // bud med bsten zhing la dub gnyid bcag rdul rtse zhing rkang pa 'chag par bya// reng bu'i dud bsten mgo bsro khrus dang skrag sman dug dang mas btang la sogs pa// bza' dang btung ba 
9a1(mdo 'grel): gnas dang sman 'di rnams kyis bad kan nye bar zhi bar 'gyur// 'phrod zas baspung dang tsha ba'i chub tung zhing // zas dang bya na yang zhing kha ba'i bcud// rtsub bral dugs dang 'ju ba bsten pa 
9a2(mdo 'grel): dang // de bzhin lus kyi steng 'og sbyang bar bya// rgun stod dbyar dang rgun smad rlung gis dus// mkhris pa ston dang so khatsha ba'i dus// bad kan dpyid ka me tog 'ong dus 'khrug/ de la de bzhin phan pa'i sman bsten 
9a3(mdo 'grel): bya// bad kan 'khrugs la skyug sman sbyar bar bya// mkhris pa'i rnam 'gyur byung la bkru sman btang // rlung gi bdag nyid 'jam rtsis 'joms par 'gyur// 'du 'phrod skyes la'ang 'dres ma de dag go/ rlung la skyur dang 
9a4(mdo 'grel): mar khu lan tsha dang // mngar ba'i bza' dang btung ba rnams kyis so// mkhris pa la ni de bzhin mngar ba dang // kha dang bska bgrang ba rnams kyis so// bad kan la yang kha dang tsha ba dang // rtsub dang bska brno 
9a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i ro rnams kyis// de rnams bza' bas nye bar 'gro 'gyur ba// nad ni rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba yin// blo gzhan nyid kyis gang de ma bstan gang zhig bstan// nad rnams rang gis rtags nas ji lta'i tshul// 
9a6(mdo 'grel): sman rnams rjes su blo gros chung ba rnams la byas// bstan bcos su ni cung zad gtan phab 'bras bur byas// yon tan lhag can sbyor ba brgya pa brjod pa yis// bsod nams bla na med pa bdag gis// 
9a7(mdo 'grel): gang thob pa// de yis rnam pa sna tshogs nad kyis gzir gyur pa// mtha' yas 'gro ba rnams kyi nad ni med gyur cig/ sbyor ba brgya pa zhes bya ba'i sman gyi gzhung 'phags pa klu sgrub zhabs kyis mdzad pa 
9a8(mdo 'grel): rdzogs so// / bal po'i paN+Di ta chen po bram ze dze ta kar+N+Na'i zhal snga nas dang po rtsa 'grel lan cig gsungs shing / dus phyis rgya gang shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta bud+d+ha shrI dz+nyAna'i zhal snga nas stod cung zad 
9b1(mdo 'grel): gsungs nas/ grub pa'i zhing spyi rong 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang po'i gtsug lag khang la cung zad las mi ring ba/ chen po'i chen po rnams kyi gdan sa dpal sher gyi gtsug lag khang du/ sdom brtson dam pa sde snod
9b2(mdo 'grel): gsum dang / rgyud dang rgyud kyi yan lag rnams las legs par 'dris shing / khyad par du tshe'i rig byed yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i gzhung don legs par rtogs pa dge slong a mo g+ha'i gsung gis 
9b3(mdo 'grel): bskul nas/ mang du thos pa'i lots+tsha ba shAkya'i dge slong dpal nyi ma rgyal mtshan bzang pos 'grel pa gsum dang bstun te bsgyur zhing legs par gtan la phab pa'o// gso dpyad gzhung lugs brgya phrag du ma'i
9b4(mdo 'grel): gnod// sna tshogs mngon brjod tha dad sdeb sbyor can// ya mtshan rgyan la legs sbyar tshig gis spel// gang 'di bskur dges nad rnams zhi bar shog/ sa steng du nyi ma dang zla ba ltar gyur cig/ lo tsA ba'i 'gyur 
9b5(mdo 'grel): bstan la dpe phyi byas nas bris te/ zhus dag legs par bgyis pa 'dis// sems can dpag tu med pa'i don byed par gyur cig/ sman 'tshe ba'i mdo klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa bzhug/ 6// rgya gar skad du/ dzI ba sA tra/ bod skad du/ sman 
9b6(mdo 'grel): 'tsho ba'i mdo/ bam po gcig pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sman pa'i mchog ste nyon mongs nad sel de la phyag btsal nas// 'phags pa'i brtul zhugs drang srong ma gtogs skyes bu 
9b7(mdo 'grel): blo ldan pas// rlung mkhris bad kan gsum dang 'khrod spyad bag bya spyod lam gyis// mi lus 'di thob don yod 'tsho ba'i don tsam bstan par bya// 'dod khro gti mug gsum las rlung mkhris bad kan 
9b8(mdo 'grel): gsum srid de/ lus yul dus la sogs pa kun dang bo de bcas dbang sgyur zhes// drang srong chen pos gsungs phyir de yi khyad par mdor bsdus nas// tshul brtags zas dang gnas spyad dgongs pa 
10a1(mdo 'grel): nyi tshe 'dir brjod pa// lus rtsub skem sems rgod tshig mang grang rlung gi mi// dmar ser blo rdo khrol drod che dri can mkhris pa'i mi// dkar snam tshig g.yung lI la drod chung gnyid chung bad kan 
10a2(mdo 'grel): mi// gnyis dang gsum du 'dres pa yang ni de las shes par bya// rgan dang dar dang byis pa rim gyis blta zhing shes par bya// ngad can grang ba rlung gi yul te tshag dur ma khris pa'i sa// rlan can snum bag 
10a3(mdo 'grel): bad kan yul te 'dres pa de las brtag/ nang par srod ni bad kan tho rangs phyi dro rlung gi dus// nyi ma phyed dang nam byed mkhris pa'i dus yin shes par bya// dpyid na bad kan ldang ste dbyar stod rlung gi sog 
10a4(mdo 'grel): ston mkhris ldang // dbyar smad rlung ljang mkhris gsog dgun stod dgun smad bad kan gsog/ ston ni rlung zhi dgun stod ma bris zhi dbyar slad bad kan zhi// lus yul dus dag brjod nas ro drug khyad par 
10a5(mdo 'grel): mdor bstan pa// mdang kun pasil te bad kun bskyed de drung mkhris sel byed na// zhun ma brang ba shing gzing ga zi ma thong stan s+ho// rbag snang ni skamasa'i gdang nas dang byar ma rnyed// bad gnas / 
10a6(mdo 'grel): nye shing ramanye bad kan mi skyed snyoms// tshab dro ste mkhris bskyed rlung dang bad kan sel byed na// srog chags mkhris pa mkhris sel na le sha ma ni rlung yang bskyed// sgur kun dro ste mkhris pa bskyed 
10a7(mdo 'grel): cing bad kan rlung sel no// skyu rur dang bal po se'u ni mkhris pa sel bar byed// ku shu mngar ni bsil la da rab chus bslad mkhris mi skyed// khab bsil te rlung bskyed bad kan mkhris pa 
10a8(mdo 'grel): sel byed na// shra dag sle tres dro ste 'phrod dang sbyar na rlung yang sel// bska ba kun ni bsil te rlung bskyed bad kan mkhris sel na// oM ru ra ni nyes pa gsum la gnod mi byed de snyoms// chang ngan/ 
10b1(mdo 'grel): bad kan rlung sel mangs na mkhris pa skyed par byed// lan tshwa dro ste rlung sel bad kan mkhris pa skyed byed na// rgya mtsha lce myang tsha ni mkhris pa la yang gnod mi byed// mngar dang bska dang lan cha 
10b2(mdo 'grel): gsum rim pa bzhin mas lci ste// skyur dang tsha dang kha ba gsum ni de bzhin rim bzhin yang // kha bo bska dang lan tshe gsum yang rim bzhin mas rtsub ste// mngar dang skyur dang tsha ba gsum yang de 
10b3(mdo 'grel): bzhin mngara' zhing 'jam// rlung mkhris bad kan gsum ka 'a dra ste nyid kyis nyid bskyed pas// lus dang yul dus zas spyod tshul gcig 'dom na nad ldang ste// ji ltar mthun par 'phrod sbyar rlung 
10b4(mdo 'grel): mkhris bad kan mi ldang pa na// de phyir 'phrod dang mi 'phrod la sogs tshul bzhin 'dir bstan pa// rlung ni mngar snum lci dro 'phrod de rtsu ba yang bsil mi 'phrod// mkhris pa kha mngar bsil dang 
10b5(mdo 'grel): 'phrod de tsha skyur dro ma'i 'phrod// bad kan snum lci bsil dang mi 'phrod rtsub tsha bskyod dang 'phrod// de bas rang gi lus dang dus gnas zas dang 'phrod spyad phyir// dpyid zla gnyis ni bad kan bskyed dus 
10b6(mdo 'grel): yin te nad lding bas// bad kan drang zhing bkru sman skyug sman btang zhing chu tshan btung // gro nas bsreg sha sbrang rtsi la sogs rtsu ba bska yang ba bza'// sgang chang rgun chang rga chu sbrang chu bu ram tshang rnying 
10b7(mdo 'grel): btung // mer tshil la sogs snum lci khar skyur po che phrom dag/ mngar 'jam skyur na bsil bag yang zhing nyin par log mi bya// chu tshas lus bkru mnye zhing las bskyong bcag bya ci ran bya// gnas kyang 
10b8(mdo 'grel): ha cang mi tsha mi grang ran dro grib mar 'dug/ dbyar stod zla gnyis mar 'bri dus yin nyal po drag shul spang // ngal dub mi bya bga' bras 'o ma mar sar sha dag bza'// bu ram tshil ni cung zad 
11a1(mdo 'grel): bza' ste chang nyung yang ba btung // 'o ma bskol grangs paras btab dang dar ba 'thungs na phan// lan tshwa sgyur zhing na le sham la sogs pa cha sbyar spang // chu 'jam tsam gyis lus bkru sman+dan 
11a2(mdo 'grel): mnyan zhing gdags// chad par reg bya nyin par tsog pur gnyid kyis log na phan// gnas kyang bser bu drag po'i ngad med dro min bsil bar 'dug/ dbyar smad zla ba gnyis na mkhris pa gsog cing 
11a3(mdo 'grel): rlung ldang ste// phyi rol tshal lus kyi nang grang nad gsum g.yo bas na// rlung nad bsal phyir lus mnye snum bsku sman chu bskol bas bkru// rlung nad sel nges til mar mas btang dugs dang lums kyang 
11a4(mdo 'grel): bya// zas kyang ha cang tsha min mngar skur med par ran par sbyar// pe badrod bskyed bag dang mar tshil sbrang rtsi bar 'ga' bza'// yos dang 'bras chan mar khu byug dang zan dron sha dag bza'// chang yang cung/ 
11a5(mdo 'grel): zad btung ste chu dang chu 'grogs spang bar bya// rlan la mi 'dug mi 'gro lus la char pas gsher mi bya// stobs dang drag shul ngal zhing dub par gyur pa'i bag dang yang // nyin mtshan mi bde nyin par mi log nyal po 
11a6(mdo 'grel): brdzun byed spang // gnas kyang rlan med rlung mi ldang la bsil bar stan gding 'dug/ ston zla gnyis ni mkhris pa skye ba'i dus yin nad ldang bas// bsil mngar bkru sman btang zhing gtar kas khrag kyang ci ran dbyung/ 
11a7(mdo 'grel): khu zhing mngaral bsil ba'i sman yang rtag tu bza' bar bya// dus 'di'i chu ni dug med gtsang dang bkrus shing 'thungs na pa na// zas kyang 'bras nas sran ma sbrang rtsi khar sha la sogs// mngar zhing kha la yang 
11a8(mdo 'grel): ba mar sar 'o ma bza' zhing btung // chang lci drag po'i ro yod mi btung ra ror mi bya ste// tshil dang til mar mi bza' zil par mi 'gro 'dug mi bya// tsha ba'i zas dang yul yang zla grogs yid du 'ong 
11b1(mdo 'grel): babasten// chu 'jam tsam gyis lus bkru gos kyang dri ma med pa bgo/ rgyan dang dri zhim lus la gdags shing shi tshan mi lde ste// gnas kyang dro min bser bus mi phog bsil bag can la 'dug/ 
11b2(mdo 'grel): dgun stod dgun smad zla bzhi phyi grang nang tsha bad kan gsog/ gos dror bgo zhing rlan dang lhags la bag bya nyi ma'ang lde// zas kyang sha tshon rus khu mar tshig snum bag 'grangs par bza'// mngar sgyur// 
11b3(mdo 'grel): lan tshwa drod bag cher bza' gsar tog 'bru dag bza'// ran par sna tshogs chang btung ngal ba'i las dag byas kyang sla// rtsa la bcag lus sbyang skabs skabs mgo lus til mar bsku zhing 
11b4(mdo 'grel): mnye// de rjes skyu ru ra la sogs pa sman bskol chus kyang bkru// gnas kyang bsro khang dron por me dang stan stag ldan par 'dug/ dbyar sbed tshe dum dbyar smad rlung dus bkru sman mi btang ste/ 
11b5(mdo 'grel): dgun stod dgun smad grang dang rgas la skyug sman gtar ka spang // dgun gnyis dbyar stod lums dugs mi bya nad kyis gzir kyang sla// de ltar yin yang lus dang nang du gar mthun rtsam par bya// 
11b6(mdo 'grel): rlung mkhris bad kan gsum dang 'phrod pas 'tsho ba'i mdo brjod nas// bag byed spyod lam can dag ring du 'tsho phyir yang bstan pa// med smra cir yang tshes dang rigs pa gzhan dag gsum la 'dzem// 
11b7(mdo 'grel): sngar byas nang nub bsam zhing skyon dor phyin chad bag cher bya// byed pa gang la rdul med rang nyam med cing 'dod chen spang // nga rgyal longs spyod spyi brtol che min shed dman zhum mi bya// sdig grog 
11b8(mdo 'grel): spang zhing dge bshes bsten te gtong smos dge bcu spyad// gsong des tshul chags gzhan la gnod min mi la byams par bya// lha dang rgyal por nyer bsam lung mnyam yid dang mthun 
12a1(mdo 'grel): par bsgrub// rgyal po'i sras dang rma ni chung yang mi brnyas bag cher bya// spyod lam sgyu mas mi bslu bka' khrims yul chos bsrung // gzhan gyis spras skyon mi brjod gtogs 
12a2(mdo 'grel): 'dod gtum chos 'gran mi bya// dge slong slob dpon pa ma'i gong du mi 'gro srishu bskyed// dge slong drang srong srog chags ya mtshan gnyan gtod sbal mi brtse// ma rtogs shing chen mchod rten drung dang 
12a3(mdo 'grel): lam mdo phug stong dang // sems can mang du bsad pa smos dur khrod nyal mi bya// gzhan pa'i mtsho dang chu mig bzang por pi bkru mi bshal te// rdo shing dgon pa'i shing chen mi bcad pha bong gzhom mi 
12a4(mdo 'grel): bya// mchod rten rgyal mtshan Ar+ya'i grib ma maN+Dal mi 'gom zhing // mi ro gtor ma ya sa btags hom khung thal khung bcag mi bya/ nam mkha' ban bun nyi ma phyed dang dmar thag chad pa'i tshe// mi bza' mi btung 
12a5(mdo 'grel): yi ge klog min nyal po las dang spang // nyi ma la sogs 'od zer phra sngags mi ring ring mi blta// lha khang sgor mi nyal te ri sna grog snar gnas mi bca'// ya mtshan shes drag mi bsten bud med ngag mi 
12a6(mdo 'grel): mnyan// bud med rgan la mi rgyo rtsal rgyo smra 'gros dub mi bya// gad mo che zhing ring du rgod dang dud mo drag po spang // rtag tu mi 'dug ring du mi 'greng ci nus ran par bcag/ sbrid pa lud pa kha chu 
12a7(mdo 'grel): mchim snabs byin bshang gcig yal// mi dgag ma bsgras bkres skomand gnyid gnag min myur dubs la// nyal po stegs pa lud pa la sogs tshe lus mjing mig nu// glal na 
12a8(mdo 'grel): kha dag basbed pa smra tshe ha cang kha mi bgrad// sen mo ring du mi bzhag bregs te phan tshun brud mi bya// mgo lus lag pas mi brda ba mgo la drag tu mi sdug ste// don med sa mi bri zhing lag pa 
12b1(mdo 'grel): mi brdab chu mi bri// mi nus bzhin du lci mi 'degs te mya ngan mnan mi bya// dpyid dang dbyar stod ston ni byugs mar dus gzhan til mar gyis// rtag tu mgo dang rkang mthil bsku zhing bar bar lus kyang bsku// ston dpyid 
12b2(mdo 'grel): ma yin res 'ga' sna dang rna bar til mar blug/ skyer ba'i khan+da stang zil dag gis bar bar mig kyang bsku// rtag tu lus kyi byi dor bya zhing sman sngags rin chen gdags// ba ser bu drag po mi ro'i dri dang dud pas phog mi bya// 
12b3(mdo 'grel): chu tshas mgo lus mi bkru ba kru sman skyugs sman btang ba dang // cham pa ma zhus btab ste mgo lus mi bkru sdam mi bsku// skya reng shar nas tsog bor 'dug ste da ring ci bya bsam// langs nas so shing bca' zhing kha yi skyon 
12b4(mdo 'grel): bsal lag gdong bkru// de nas sman mchog a ru ra ni rtag zos bdud rtsi yin// lug gi mar min mar ser zhun mar nas sra tshe ring ste// 'di la sogs pa lus dang tshe la phan pa'i sman zos na// byug brgyan dang gos 
12b5(mdo 'grel): bye / ga gyu babyud/ ma ban pa ya 
12b6(mdo 'grel): ngoms par skom bcung ste// thug pa khwa tshan la sogs snum lci drod kun sngar bza' zhing // 'bras la sogs pa bsil yang phyis bza' zad med phyi ma bkam// bab chol ha cang 'grangs par bza' min myos par chang mi 
12b7(mdo 'grel): btung // 'bras kyis 'grangs rjes phye zan mi bza' drod rjes skom mi btung // skyom ngan par 'thungs na lus rtanang na rgan la gsod// ro drug gang yang gcig la cher zos nad ldang ngan par sbyar// 'grangs pa'i rjes la nyal po// 
12b8(mdo 'grel): ba stobs na rgyug la sogs spang // shing tog lnga ba ldum mangs na nad ldang ba mos phog pa gnod// dbyar zla 'bring po ches la ldam ldum bza' drags nad du 'gyur// nad can lums kyis drangs te mgyogs na nad ldang 
13a1(mdo 'grel): skran du 'ong // mchin pa g.yer ma spangs te zos na cung zad snying la gnod// zas mchog sbrang rtsi mar rnying cha mnyam zos na dug bzhin gnod// me mnyam che chung byas kyang zos rjes chang chu 
13a2(mdo 'grel): 'thungs na gnod// ma langs zho dang langs ma thag gi zho dron nad kun slong // du bya dbyar spang ldum mchog gi lun dbyar zla 'bring po'i sman// sman 'thungs sha ba'i sha gnod ga go zhor 'dres rims su 
13a3(mdo 'grel): 'gyur// btsong bsregs sbrang rtsir mi 'phrod lhan cig zos na 'chi bar 'gyur// ke'u 'am gnag sha lhan cig zos na sman du 'gyur// dgun sdong rgya g.yer zos na snying na drags na mig kyang ldong // mar tshil 
13a4(mdo 'grel): zos dang mi 'phrod lta ba bza' drags na so 'byung // bra bo mang du zos na rlung dang lus g.ya' ste// nub mo chu 'thung chang gnon la phug rnying dang sha skam spang // nya dang kha cha mar tshil mi 'phrod snod kyang gcig mi d+ya// 
13a5(mdo 'grel): nya dang 'o ma lhan cig mang zos nang na zer ma gnod// shing tog chang la sogs te sgra dang shang tshal bug rnon// srungs rnying 'di rnams gang yang 'o mar 'phrod min mang zos gnod// 'tshon 'brangs rjes chu bgog 
13a6(mdo 'grel): 'thungs dang rgya sran nag po gnod// zla ba spyang kis zin tshe zan zos so na shu ba 'byung // gnag sha sha rta lhan cig zos na lus la g.yan pa 'ong // gan ga sha phag sha lhan cig zos na lto yi srin bur 'gyur/ 
13a7(mdo 'grel): nya dang khyim bya'i sha gnyis lhan cig zos na skran du 'gyur// khyim bya'i sgo nga'i spri dang sgog skya zos na dbugs mi bde// khyim bya'i sha dang ri bong sha gnyis lhan cig zos na cung zad 'khru// sha mo yungs 
13a8(mdo 'grel): mar nang du brdos pa zos na lus la gnod// ma nu'i sa bon ka tsam tsi dang sbrang rtsir 'phrod ma yin// la phug bu ram mi 'phrod zho dang bya gag shar mi 'phrod// de ltar 'phrod zas goms dang rtag tu 
13b1(mdo 'grel): 'chag pa dang // lang tsho 'ju skas zos dang nyung na gnod pa med dang bsre// 'phrod pa'i zas zos phyi dro'i las byas nab sros bde bar nyal// de ltar nan tan bag byas mi tshe tshad bzhin 'tsho nges pa/ 
13b2(mdo 'grel): skyes nas lo bcu'i bar du sma mi dbab cing rang gar bzhag/ de nas nyi shu lon te lo bcur bslab dang rtsol bar bya// de nas lnga bcu lnga lon sum cu rtsa lnga khyud khong du// longs spyod grags pa'i yul srid 
13b3(mdo 'grel): gtam byas nas// lnga bcu lnga lon phyin chad chos lam yum gyi ched bsgrub phyir// dge la brtson bskyed thos rig goms byed lus sems ci bder gnas// de ltar sras nus mi lus thob pa'i don 
13b4(mdo 'grel): yod skyed cing dge/ slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub snying pos sman pa rnams la brdzangs pa// sman 'tsho ba'i mdo tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so// / slob dpon klu skabs kyis bshad 
13b5(mdo 'grel): rnamam pa mas ma ga pa dang / pag gas pa pa dang / sa pa dang/ sa / 
13b6(mdo 'grel): bad kan dang / mkhris pa dang / dreg nad dang / dargan dang / ro smad man chad 'jas pa dang / na ste mi bde na yang nad kyi ngos ma zin te cin gtol med pa dang / mig nad sna tshogs pa dang / nas sra 
13b7(mdo 'grel): bar bya ba dang / ro tsa bar bya ba la sogs pa'i dpyad/ lha chen po gu laM gis gu laM gi btsun mo zhes bshad de/ a ba yin no// a ba gtang ba'i tshes grangs 'dam pa ni/ tshes bdun dang / brgyad dang / bcu 
13b8(mdo 'grel): gsum la bzang ngo // skar ma 'dam pa ni ba ru Na'i dus la bab pa'i chu lha ste/ bdud rtsi dang 'byor pa'i skar mal bzang ste sman btang ngo // sman btang ba'i thabs ni nad cin yang rung ste/ dang por sbrang rtsi las sbyar 
14a1(mdo 'grel): te btang / de'i 'og tu zhun mar la sbyar te btang / de'i 'og tu 'bru bar la sbyar te btang ngo // sbrang nI la sogs pa sA re re 'dra ste/ shag bdud bdur sbyang zhing 'phral te 'tshal lo// phan pa'i 
14a2(mdo 'grel): sA grangs ni/ lus kyi rus pa chag pa dang / rkang lo chan grubs byung ngo cog dang / lus la rma byung ngo cog dang / snying na pa dang / rtsi ba logs na ba dang / re snyed gzer ba dang / glo na pa dang / rus pa 
14a3(mdo 'grel): tshig go cog la lhag par pan no// rlung las gyur pa'i nad brgyad cu sbed yod pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa'i nad kyi rna pa grangs nyi shu dang / bad kan gyi rang nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste/ spyir nang brgya nyi shu rtsa bzhi yod 
14a4(mdo 'grel): ba ril 'byang ngo // dreg nad dang / grang nad dang / cha grang 'dres pa las gyur pa'i nad dang / mdor na nad ci yang rung ste/ sman a ba btang na nad do cog 'byung ngo zhes lha chen po tshangs pa dang / gul 
14a5(mdo 'grel): gis bshad pa las thos so// mig rab rib yod pa dang / ling tog dang / spris g.yogs pa dang / ldongs pa dang / mig g.ya' ba dang / na ba dang / mig nad yod do cog dang / mgul pa man 
14a6(mdo 'grel): chad na ba dang / sna nad dang / rna ba mi gsang ba dang / klad pa mi bde ba dang / mchin nad dang / snying nad dang / ro stod mi bde ba dang / 'di rnams la 'bras bu gsum las sna gcig kyang zho re re/ 
14a7(mdo 'grel): lcags phye zho gsum lcags dog gi nang du chab can rtse gsum las bsgral te gang lus pa dang / btsags la chu dron 'jam tsam gyi nang du sman a ba zhib du btags pa zho gsum btab ste/ 'jam tsam 
14a8(mdo 'grel): la nub mo nyal gar 'tshal lo// dgongs 'tshal mi 'tshal na/ dro 'tshal ba'i rjes la 'tshal lo// sman 'di nyin zhag nyi shu tsam btang na/ ldongs pa yang mig gis mthong bar 'gyur ro// 
14b1(mdo 'grel): yang sbyor ba rnam gcig la/ 'bras bu gsum las sna gcig kyang zho re re/ lcags phye zho gsum/ bar mar srang gnyis/ chab can rtse gsum gyi nang du bskol te/ do ni du/ gang ni lus pa dang // 
14b2(mdo 'grel): btsags te dro 'jam tsam gyi nang du a ba btags pa zho gsum btab la nyal gar 'tshal lo// dgongs 'tshal mi 'tshal ba lta zhig ra/ dro 'tshal ba'i rjes la 'tshal lo// 'di bzhin du zhag bzhi 
14b3(mdo 'grel): bcu rtsa lnga'i bar du 'tshal na/ mig phyung ba ma gtogs pa/ dbus long dang mdongs pa yang mthong bar 'gyur ro// lo bcu drug pa gzhon nu'i tshad du 'gyur ro// a ba phye ma mar ldan pa// rus pa 
14b4(mdo 'grel): chag pas nub gsum du// 'thungs na de yi rus pa ni// rdo rje lta bur sra bar 'gyur// a ba tsha ba gsum de bzhin// tshan gnye shing rtsa ba yis// drug skam rus pa na ba dang // lud pa de bzhin 
14b5(mdo 'grel): dbugs mi bde// stong na pa dang sha tshod la// de rnams cha ni mnyam byas te// bye mar byas nas nub gsum du// chu ngon lhan cig myur du btung // 'bras bu gsu pa ni 'a ba dang // bakhas pas de 
14b6(mdo 'grel): bzhin bsgrol byas nas// mar ni sum cha gcig dang ldan// de bzhin a ba bzhi cha gcig/ zan zos 'og tu rub gsum du// 'thungs nasa'u sha gsum dang bza'// gyen du za ba'i nad las rgyal/ 
14b7(mdo 'grel): rab rib rdzi bor mig ser dang // tshad rnying g.yan pa tshar bcas dang // mig gi rang ni thams cad dang // gzhan yang de bzhin klad nad dang // lto nad dang ni snying nad dang // de bzhin yan lag chag pa dang / 
14b8(mdo 'grel): zhag gsum du ni rab sbyar na// long ba dag ni mthong bar 'gyung // a ba som radza dang // rA yi 'o mar sgrol te btung // 'bungs na rlung ltar mgyogs par 'gyur// a ba phyem mar sar dang // Sha ra de bzhi/ 
19a1(mdo 'grel): mtshan mo don chen dag la ni// dbyug thogs 'og dkri grogs lngar bya// mchod rten mchod bya rgyal mtshan dang // mi shis grib ma thal phub dang // mi gtsang gseg bong gtor ma dang // khrus byas/ 
19a2(mdo 'grel): sa ni bsgom mi bya// chu bor rgyal te 'gro mi bya// mchen phung por 'gro mi bya// the tshom bcas pa'i gru shing las// gzhon pa mi bsrun bzhan mi gzeg/ sbrid pa gang mo glal pa la// kha ni gdangs par mi bya'o// 
19a3(mdo 'grel): snga ni bru bar mi bya zhing // don med sa ris mi bya'o// lus kyi yan lag mi gcu zhing // tse gtsog por yang 'dug mi bya// lus ngag yid kyi spyod pa ni// snga nas la las bzlog par bya// pus 'greng yun ring 
19a4(mdo 'grel): gnas mi bya// mtshan mo shing drung bsten mi bya// sum mdo mchod rten drung bzhi mdo// lha yi khang pa'ang de bzhin no// gsod sa 'brog stong khang stong dang // dur khrod du ni nyin mo'ang yin// rnam kun nyi ma 
19a5(mdo 'grel): la mi blta// mgo yis bur ni bskur mi bya// shin tu phra dang 'tsher ba dang // mi gtsang mi sdug rgyun mi blta// chang 'tshong ba dang sbyor ba dag/ sbyin dang len la spyad mi bya// mdun gyi gser bu nyin tshan rdul// 
19a6(mdo 'grel): ba mo dang ni rlung chub dang // sbrid pa sgregs pa lud pa zas// gnyid log nyal po bcus mi bya// gang kha'i grib ma rgyal po sdang // sbal gdug gcan zan rA con dang // dus mtshams dag tu zas bza' dang / 
19a7(mdo 'grel): bud med nyal log sems las dang // dgra bo'i nar mar zan tshogs 'dus// smad 'tshong tshong pa'i zas dag dang // lus dang mchu dang sen sgra 'byin// lag pa sgra ni sprug pa dang // chu me mchod bya'i bar du 'gro// 
19a8(mdo 'grel): ro bsregs la bsten dud pa dang // chang sogs chags dang bud med la// yid rton rang dbang gyur pas spang // blo ldan spyod pa thams cad la// 'jig rten nyid ni slob dpon yin// de bas 'jig 
19b1(mdo 'grel): rten pa yi don// rtogs par byed pas de nyid bya// snying rjes bslan zhing stong dang ldan// lus dang ngag yid dul ba dang // gzhan gyi don la rang don sems// de dag dam pa'i spyod mthar thug/ de ltar bdag ni 
19b2(mdo 'grel): nyin mtshan du// ji lta bur ni gnas 'gro nas// rtag tu dran pa nyer 'dzeg pa// sdug bsngal snod du mi 'gyur ro// de ltar spyod pa mdor bsdus pas// gang zhig kun tu spyod byed pa// tshe dang nad med dbang phyug dang // 
19b3(mdo 'grel): grags pa 'jig rten rtag 'thob 'gyur// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las mdo'i gnas kyi le'u gnyis pa'o// // de nas dus su spyad pa'i le'u bshad par bya'o// dgun zla rab sogs ga 
19b4(mdo 'grel): gnyis// rim bzhin dus ni drug tu bshad// de las dgun zla tha chung sogs// gsum ni byang du 'gro zhes bya// de tshe mi rnams nyin po zhing // mthu 'phrog pa zhes bya ba yin// de tshe shin du rno zhing che// rngub pa'i lam 
19b5(mdo 'grel): gyi ngo bo nyid// nyi marlung gi zla ba yaM// sa yi yon tan zad par byed// 'dir ni tshabaska kha ba yi// ro rnams stobs ni che ba yin// de bas me ni mthu stobs 'phrogs// lho phyogs su ni 'gro ba'i dus// dbyung 
19b6(mdo 'grel): la sogs par skar stobs bskyed// 'di stabs slar ni bskyed pas na// 'dir ni bsil bas zla ba ni// stobs dang ldan pas nyi ma 'bri// char 'bab pa dang rlung bsil bas// sa steng tsha bzhi ba na// 'dir 
19b7(mdo 'grel): ni snum dang skyur lan cha// mngar po'i ro rnams mthu bskyed do// dgun che char dang tshadus su// stobs chung lhag ma dgal 'bring // stobs ldan grang bas bkag pas na// dgun gyi dus su me stobs ldan// 
19b8(mdo 'grel): deni rlung gis spang bas na// zas thang byung na lus zungs skams// de bas dgran nimangar sbyar dang // lan tshwab ni bsten par bya// de na metshan mo ring bas na// nang pa nyid ni bkris par 'gyur// des pa 
20a1(mdo 'grel): bya ba byas nas ni// ji skad bshad rdzogs de rjes la// rlung 'joms til mar gyis byug cing // spyi bo til mar gyis byug mnye// bag yod pa dang stobs 'gyed cing // kang pas ran par
20a2(mdo 'grel): mnye bar bya// de nas bskabs snum bsal ba// cho ga bzhin du khrus dag bya// gur gum gla N+DI dang bcas pa// lus bsra a ka ru yis bdug/ sha tshon bu ba snam pa dang // bu ram chang dang chang dngas 
20a3(mdo 'grel): chang // gro dang 'bras khur ma sha dang // 'o ma bu ram shing byas bza'// kha zas gsar dang zhag til mar// dro 'jam chu yis gtsang sbra bya// be'u ras skrag pa dang sogs bgo/ dre'u rngog re'u bal la ba gding // 
20a4(mdo 'grel): rang bzhin rno zhing yang ba yi// gos bag mal la brten par bya// nye ba'i 'od la ngan bar bde// dugs bya b+ha pa ni rtag tu bgo// rlung ma gzhon zhing yid 'ang rgyags// nu ma brla dang ro smad rgyas// gung gum gyis 
20a5(mdo 'grel): byugs spos kyis bdugs// lus kyi drod kyis grang sel ba'o// sa khang khang pa nyis rim byas// mdag ma'i drod kyis bsngos pa ni// grang dang rngub pa las byung ba'i// nyes pa nam yang mi 'byung ngo // dgun smad 
20a6(mdo 'grel): dus du lhag par yang // cho ga 'di nyid bya ba yin// de tshe lhag par grang ba dang // stobs 'phrog las byung chub pa yin// dgur ni bad kan kho na sogs// dpyid dus nyi ma'i 'od dros pa// ma yi drod nyams nad bskyed 
20a7(mdo 'grel): de// de bas de ni myung du bsal// rdo dang snag sma sA sman sogs// yang dang rngub pa'i tha zas dang // bcag dang lus kyi mnye ba yis// bad kan bde ba'i nad bsal bya// khrus byas ga pud tsan dan dang // 
20a8(mdo 'grel): gur gum sogs pas bsla bar bya// nas deng grinan pa dang // sbrang rtsi samasa'i bsreg sha bza'// a ma' bra ba dang sbyang ba'o// bu ba som du sbyar ba btung // chung mtshan ma yangs kyis// min 
20b1(mdo 'grel): ldan dang lhan cig bcing // yid ni dga' zhing bder byas pas// grogs dang lhan cig btung bar bya// skyod med chang rgan dro 'jam dang // bur ma rgun chang sbrang chang dang // sgra chu bskol dang se'u'i chu// sbrang chu'am b+ha sgang / 
20b2(mdo 'grel): chub tu bya// lho phyogs bser bus bsil ba dang // mtha' ma kun tu chu 'bab la// nyi ma'i 'od ni mi sdang dang // nang bu bcag 'dra'i mdangs ldan pa// babyug snyan pa sgra sgrog cing // 'dod pa'i longs spyod ldan pa'i sa 
20b3(mdo 'grel): sna tshogs me tog ldan pa'i shing // dri zhim skyed mos tshal du ni// dga' 'dun gtam ni sna tshogs pas// phyed dus bde bas bde bar bya// lci bsil nyin mo nyal ba dang // snum bag mdar sbyor spang bar bya/ 
20b4(mdo 'grel): nyi ma'i 'od zer rab tshabs// sog 'phrog po 'dra ba yin// de bas de tshe lan tshwa cha// skyur sol nyi ma'i 'od zeng spang // zas ni mngar dang yang ba dang // snum bsil sla ba nyid bsten bya// rab bsil chu yis 
20b5(mdo 'grel): lus krus zhing // phye zan Sha ra bcas pa bza'// chang mi btung ste 'thung na yang // nyung ba 'am chu mang bsres la btung // gzhan du de ni kha bskams lhod// tshe dang rmongs par byed pa yin// 'bras chan kun+da ltar 
20b6(mdo 'grel): dkar dang // skam sa'i srog chags sha dag bza'// bu ba mi bska zho dang ni// bu ram sbyar sogs g.yos byas btung // phal cher skyur ba btung bar bya'o// snying po lnga yi btung ba ni// kham phor sar pa la 
20b7(mdo 'grel): gnas pa// chu shing rgyas ltar dum bu bsres// sbyar bcas kham por snod kyis btung // chu ni pa ta las bsgongs shing // ga pur bcas shing shin tu bsil// zla zer lta bu'i bza' ba ni// mtshan mo dus su bza' 
20b8(mdo 'grel): bdang // zla ba skar ma ltar dka' ba'i// ma he'i 'o ma bsil mo btung // sA la tA la chen po na// sprin reg tsha ba'i 'od zer sgrib// rgun 'bru'i snye ma g.yur za zhing // 'khri shing dang ldan nags tshal bzang / 
21a1(mdo 'grel): dri bzang kha ba'i chu yis ni// bsil khang lus dang 'tsham byas pa// ldum bu 'bras bu 'chang ba dang // chu shing 'dab dang ka ltar// pad rtsa pad+ma ut+pal// me tog rgyas pa dang ldan par/ 
21a2(mdo 'grel): 'jam pa'i gnas mal bcas nas ni// phyed dus nyi mas gdung pas na// nyal ba 'am chu yi khang pa ni// bud med bcos gzugs nu ma lag/ kha las u shing chu 'bab bya// mtshan mo yang thog rdo thal byugs// 
21a3(mdo 'grel): zla ba'i 'od kyis bsil bar nyal// mal stan bde bar sems bde zhing // tsan dan lde gu 'phreng ba thogs// rab tu phra ba'i gos bgos shing // 'dod pa'i rgyun las ldog par bya// tA la'i bsil yab spos chu 
21a4(mdo 'grel): btab// pad+ma'i 'dab rgyas rlung yab dang // dal gyis legs par g.yob pa dang // rdzi char bser bu dang ldan bya// gapung mal+li ka 'phreng ba// mu tig do shal tsan dan dkar// ne tso sha ri ka la sogs// sgra stan 
21a5(mdo 'grel): yid 'ong sgrogs pa dang // chung ma gdu pu pad rtsa 'dra// pad+ma rgyas pa lta bur mdzes// pad+ma can ni 'gro 'dra ba// snyoms par sel bar byed pa yin// mthu 'phrogs pas ni na ba'i lus// dman par las kyang dman// 
21a6(mdo 'grel): gyur te// dbyar gyi gnod pas gnod 'gyur te// mkha' la sprin 'dus chu yis brlan// chu thigs bcas pa'i rlung dang ni// grang ba drag po ldang ba dang // sa yi rlangs pa skur smin dang // chu ni rnyog pa can dag gis// 
21a7(mdo 'grel): midrod chud pas gnod par byed// phan tshun gnod pa de la ni// dro zhing me yi stobs bskyed pa// thun mong gang yin bsten par bya// sbyang bas lus ni dag byas pa// zas ni yang bag khub bza'// skam sa'i 
21a8(mdo 'grel): srog chags sha lu dang // sbrang rtsi chang ni rnying pa btung // dar ba khadu tshang sbyar ba// tsha ba lnga'i phye ma can// thon pa'i chu ni bskol ba'ang rung // char che'i dus su kha zas ni// rang skur lan tshwa snam dang bcas/ 
21b1(mdo 'grel): sram zhing sbrang rtsir ldan la yang // rkang gis mi 'gro dri zhim byug/ rtag tu gos ni sos kyis bdugs// khang bzang steng du ba po bsil// char gyi zer spangs gnas par bya// klung chu dang sbyar spyom dang // nyin 
21b2(mdo 'grel): col dang nyin can spang // dbyang lus bsil bar gyur pa la// 'phral du ni zer gyis gdungs pas// char 'bab tshen bsags pa yi// mkhris pa ston ni ldang bar 'gyur// de bsal phyir ni sman mar kha// bkru sman 
21b3(mdo 'grel): btang dang gta ga bya// Da dang mngar dang sra ba dang // bkres tshe zas ni yin pa bza'// 'bras chan mud s+phu ru ra// sbrang rtsi skamasa'i pa tol// nyi ma'i zer gyis gdungs pa dang // b+hu ba'i 'od kyis bsol 
21b4(mdo 'grel): byas la// re'i shar bas dug med pa// nyin mtshan gnyi gar sbyangs chub tung // dang ba'i dri med chu zhes pa// dri med dri ma sel 'gyur ba// mi 'brug rtsub pa ma yin pa// btung ba la sogs bdud rtsir mtshungs// 
21b5(mdo 'grel): tsan dan u shi ga pur dang // mu tig rkun 'phyan 'phreng gos mdzes// kha bzang rdo thal gyis dkar zhing // zla zer can du mtshan gnas kyang // zil pa thal sman ha cang 'drangs// zho dang til mar zhag nyi tshan/ 
21b6(mdo 'grel): mi bzad chang dang nyin par nyal// mdun gyi bsil bu yongs su spang // dgun dang dbyar ni dang po gsum// dpyid ni tha ma'i ro gsum ste// sog mngar ste ston ka ni// mngar dang kha dang bskab bsten// mdor 
21b7(mdo 'grel): na zas dang skom dag ni// ston dang dpyir ni rngub pa ste// sog dbyar mtha' bsil bar bya// gzhan dag du ni de las bzlog/ rtag tu ro kun bsten pa las// rang rang dus su lhag par bsten// dus gnyis thog/ 
21b8(mdo 'grel): mtha'i zhag bdun ni// dus mtshams yin par shes par bya// der ni snga pa'i cho ga spang // 'og mang rim bzhin bsten par bya// ma spangs na ni nad 'gyur te// 'phral du nad ni 'ong bar 'gyur// mdo'i gnas 
22a1(mdo 'grel): la'u gsum pa'o/ de nas nad ma 'byung bar byab 'ad pyad kyi le'u bshad par byag// phyi dbugs bshang gcu sbed pa dang // bkres skam gnyid dang lung ngal dbugs/ 
22a2(mdo 'grel): thal dang mchi ma skrag pa dang // khu ba'i shugs ni dgag ma bya// bya ni bkag par zur pa yis// sran dang drug skam gzer sdo ma l-I// byed dang bshang gci bong du 'gags// mig rdul drod chung skang 
22a3(mdo 'grel): nad 'gyur// bshang 'gags byin pa'ina'agyur zhing // rnam pas 'debs shing klad pan// khar ni mi gtsang 'byung ba dang // sngar bshad nad du'ang 'gyur ba yin// gcin bsgags pa yis yan lag na/ 
22a4(mdo 'grel): rde'u chu se pho mtshan dang // dku yi nang na sngar gyi nad// phal cher 'byung ngo de yi sman// reng bu bsku b+hag lus spring dang // dugs dang sman mar mas btang ba'o// zas skom bshang ba 'gags pa dang // bshang 'gag
22a5(mdo 'grel): las byung glo gcod mtshungs// chu 'gag pa la mar sar ni// che tshad tsam ni rab tu sbyar// sgrags pa bkag na yig 'chus// lus 'dar snying dang brang 'gags na// spro zhing lung ba skyigs bus 
22a6(mdo 'grel): 'debs// de sman skyigs bu dag dang 'dra// sprid bkag mgo na dbang mi rno// gnyi'u rengs kha yo 'gram chag 'gyur// dud rnon gyis bdug mig sman dang // sna sman nyi ma lta ba yis// sbrid pa 'gag 
22a7(mdo 'grel): pa bsal bya zhing // snga ma dang dugs kyang bsten par bya// skom pa bsgrags pas kha bskams shing // yan lag mi bden mi gsang // mgo 'khor myos shing snying nad 'byung // der bsil cho ga thams cad phan/ 
22a8(mdo 'grel): bkres pas lus zhig yig 'chus// lus stobs nyam chung gzer mgo 'khor// de la zas yang snum dro dang // chung pa dag ni sbyar bar bya// gnyid bkag khong myos spyi bo mig/ lci zhing snyom la glal 'ong zhing / 
22b1(mdo 'grel): lus zhig snyam sems de la ni// gnyid log lus mnyes phan pa yin// lud pa bkag pas de 'phel zhing // dbugs mi bde zhing yig 'chus// snying nad skem byed skyigs bus 'debs// der ni lung bsal chog 
22b2(mdo 'grel): bya// ngal dub dbugs ni bkag pa las// sman dang snying nad myos par 'gyur// de la nga la gso bya ba dang // rlung sel ba yi chog pan// glal bkag pa'i spring bkazho mtshungs// chog thams cad rlung 'joms bya/ 
22b3(mdo 'grel): mche ma bkag pas mgo snying ra// gnya' rengs yig 'chus mgo 'khor// skan bcas sna chu 'dzag 'gyur der// gnyid ngoms chang bdung gtam snyan pan// smyug bro mnags pas me dpal mdze// 'bras dang mig nad 
22b4(mdo 'grel): g.yan pa rims// s+yArbab lud pa dbugs mi bde// dang ga ro stod mi bde spangs// kha bkang da bo dung srung bar gnas// nu ba zos de nyid sdug pa dang // rtsol dang myur bar gtar ga gdab// bkru sman btang ba'ang 
22b5(mdo 'grel): bsngags pa yin// khu ba bkag pas de 'dzag dang // bo mtshar ni dang 'od na de rims// snying na dkyus 'gags lus rigs dang // rde'u 'bi la dang ma ning 'gyur// de la khyim bu'i sha dang chang // 'bras chan mas 
22b6(mdo 'grel): btang lus sprid dang // chu so'i nad bsal til mar bcos// 'o ma bud med gzhon bsten phan// shugs ni bkag dang btsir ba yis// nad ni kun kyang 'byung bar 'gyur// shin tu mang po de yi phyir// gso pyad 
22b7(mdo 'grel): mang po 'dir bshad do// de las phal cher rlung du ma// gang phyir 'khrugs par gyur pas na// de phyir de yi zas sgom sman// mnyam par 'gyur ba sbyar ba bya// 'di dang gzhan du phan 'dod pas// 'dod chen phrag dog zha 
22b8(mdo 'grel): sdang dang // ser sna 'dod chags la sogs shugs// rtag dgag po bral bar bya// dri ma rnams ni sbyang ba'i phyir// ji bzhin dus su nan tan bya// de ni shin du gsogs gyur na// shas cher 'khrug pas srog 
23a1(mdo 'grel): rgyun gcod// gnod pa snang dang bzhu byas pas// bsal kyang slar ni ljang srid kyi// gang zhig legs par sbyang ba dag/ de ni slar yang 'byung mi 'gyur// dus shes pa yis de par 
23a2(mdo 'grel): rkang// rim pa bzhin du ci rigs par// bcud kyis len rnams grub pa dang // ro co'i sbyor ba sbyang bar bya// sman rnams kyis ni lus sbyangs phan// sa lu drug nu pa dang kr-i// pud+mA sha dang mar la sogs// 
23a3(mdo 'grel): pan pa'i zas kyis rim lus na// yid 'ong drodang skyeng spun sbyar ba// yi ga 'bye zhing 'ju byed dang // bsku zhing dril gyis khrus bcas dang // drag po 'jam rtsims btang brtas// des ne me kun stobs ldan 
23a4(mdo 'grel): zhing // blo mdog dbang po dri ma med// de bzhin tshe ring ro tsa dang // dpal dang gzi mdangs thob par 'gyur// 'byung po dug dang rlung dang me// mtshon rmas chag grugs sogs 'byung dang // 'dod chags zhe sdang 
23a5(mdo 'grel): 'jigs sogs gang // de ni glo bur nad ces bya// shes rab nyes pa spang ba dang / dbang po nyer zhing dran pa dang // yul dus bdag nyid shes pa dang // dam pa'i spyod pa'i rnam 'jug pa// lhan cig skyes dang 
23a6(mdo 'grel): glo bur nad// mdor nam skyes pa yi phyir// skyes pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir// cho ga 'di ni bstan pa yin// grang ba las byung nyes tshogs dpyid kyi tshe// rnam bso la sog las byung dbyar dus na// dbyar 
23a7(mdo 'grel): bsags sprin bral dus su legs sbyangs nas// dus byung nang ni nam yang 'byung mi 'gyur// nag tu phan pa'i zas dang spyod lam bsten// brtags te byed cing yul rnams la ma chags// gtong ldan 
23a8(mdo 'grel): sems snyoms bden brtson bzod dang ldan// nyams ldan bstan par byed na nad med 'gyur// mdo'i gnas le'u bzhi pa'o// de nas chu sna tshogs la sogs pa'i bye brag shes par bya ba'i le'u bshad 
23b1(mdo 'grel): par bya'o// // mkha' las 'bab pa'i gang+gA'i chu// 'tsho byed ngoms byed yid gar 'ong // tshim zhing sems ni gsal byed pa// slar zhing ro mi gsal la zhim// bsil zhing yang ba bdud rtsir mtshungs// 
23b2(mdo 'grel): iT rlung gis reg gyur pa// de ni yul dus la bltos nas// phal cher phan dang gnod pa yin// gang zhig char 'bab dri ma med// 'bras chan dngul phor nang gnas pa// ma rul mdog kyang ma gyur pa// gad+hA'i chu 
23b3(mdo 'grel): ste btung bar bya// gzhan du mtsha chu ston zla ni// 'bring po min par btung mi bya// char pa'i chu ni snod bzang bzhag/ 'gyur ba med pa rtag tu btung // de med na ni thang la gnas// bar snang ba dang rjes mthun yin// 
23b4(mdo 'grel): sa phyogs dkar nag gtsang zhing yangs// nyi 'od rlung gis phog pa bsngags// lteng ka 'dam rdi ba nya lcibs dang // rtswa dang lo ma rnyog ma can// nyi zla rlung gis ma phog pa// mngon du 'bab dang chu gang lci// lnga ba 
23b5(mdo 'grel): srog chags can dang ngo // grang ches so yis mi bzod pa// char gang dus su ma bab dang // dus kyi dang por 'bab pa gang // srog chags gdug dang ba sogs 'dres// bshang gci dug 'dres gnod mi btung // 
23b6(mdo 'grel): nub phyogs nas ni rgya mtshor 'bab// gang yang myur 'bab rdul med chu// de dag mdor na dge ba yin// de las bzlog pa bzang ma yin// rdo la shugs drag rdebs pa yis// rgyun chad g.yengs pa chu dag dang // / 
23b7(mdo 'grel): gang nan ma la ya las byung // dge'o de nyid brtan g.yung na// srin bu nang 'bam rnying dang ni// lkog ma klad pa'i nad skyems gyur// shar dang nub kyi mtha' las byung // gnang 'brum skyed do dbang chen 'bag/ 
23b8(mdo 'grel): dmu rdzing rkang 'bam nad skyed 'gyur// sa d+ya ban+di'i ri las 'bab// mdze dang s+ya rbab klad nad 'gyur// pa ri ya tra'i nad kun sel// thon pa rdzing la sogs pa'i chu// skam sa rlan can zag la shes// drod chung 
24a1(mdo 'grel): skran yod skye rba ba dang // dmu rdzing tshad 'khru gzhang 'brum mam// pho ba'i drod chung 'or nad can// mi btung brnag dka' nyung zad btung // ston ka so ga ma gtogs par// nad med mis kyang cung 
24a2(mdo 'grel): zad btung // zan zos par mtha' thog mar ni// chu 'thungs ran dang sbom skems 'gyur// chu bsil chang nad brgyal ba dang // skyugs dang ngal dang mgo 'khor dang // skom dang lus tsha mkhris pa dang // khrag rgyas 
24a3(mdo 'grel): dag ni sel byed yin// chu tshan drod skyed zas 'ju zhing // mgul ba de lus yang gcin nad sel// skyigs bu lto spos rlung bad ka ni// rims sar 'phral du zlog byed cing // lud pa cham sar dbugs mi bde// 
24a4(mdo 'grel): rtsib logs zug la chu tshan bsngagaso// chu ni bskol la bsgrangs pa dag/ bad kan mi skyed lus yang zhing // mkhris pa can la phan pa yin// de ni zhag lon nyes gsum bskyed// rgya star chu ni snum pa dang // 
24a5(mdo 'grel): ro mngar ro mi bsal zhing yang // skom dang mkhris pa rlung nad sel// drod skyed lgang ba'i nad sbyong byed// dbyar gyi char chu chu bo'i chu// mchog tu bzang dang ngan par bshad// chu'i sde tshan no// 'o ma phal cher ro zho

24b1(mdo 'grel): ma mas ka samams pa mamams thas pamasamamams ma ma pa mamatha ma mas sa mas lags masas pa ya ra sa mas pa sa thags sa mas yas ma ma nga as a ma

27a8(mdo 'grel): tshil 'odad mu rdzing gnang 'brum sel// de bas khub bskol mchog yin// sbrang chang 'grib byed rno ba yin// gcin nad cham pa lud pa sel// tsha ni khrag mkhris bad kan dag/ 'dzu ni nga rlung ni snyoms byed la// rab tu cha zhing 
27b1(mdo 'grel): rno nub sbyar// yid 'ong yig 'bye zhing 'khru// drod bskyed reg na bsil ba dang // skya rbab srin sel mig la gnod// bu ram bu shing rgun chang dang // tsha ni phyi ma phyi ma yang // sdong bu rtsa ba 'bras sogs las// mnan byas 
27b2(mdo 'grel): de dang 'drer shes bya// rdo gu la sogs bshur ba gzhan// dus kyi skyur po yang zos len// 'bras khu'i rang skyur 'khru rno che// mkhris paskyed byed bskus na bsil// ngal dang rmya sel yi ga 'bye// drod bskyed chu 
27b3(mdo 'grel): so'i nad sel yin// mas btang la phan yid du 'ong // yang zhing rlung dang bad kan 'joms// ba gcin ra lug ma he dang // glang po rta bong rnga me'i gcin// mkhris bskyed rtsub cing rno la tsha// 'thungs rjes 
27b4(mdo 'grel): tsha dror cha ste// srin nad 'or nad dmu rdzing spos// gzer dang skya zab bad kan rlung // dug skran sha sga yi ga 'chus// mdze dang gzhang 'brum myur du 'joms// de ltar chu bo bu ram shing // til mar chang gi 
27b5(mdo 'grel): sde tshoms rim// gsher ba'i rdzas phyogs gcig pa 'di// rags rim ji bzhin bstan pa yin// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// mdo'i gnas kyi le'u lnga pa'o// // de nas kha zas kyi tshul brtag cing 
27b6(mdo 'grel): shes par bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o// rtsa snang 'bras chen ka ma la// drug cu pa dang bya yis blang // sgron bu'i mchu dang rtse rnon dang // ro 'dra'i 'bras 'dra dri bzang dang // ba dang ka dang gser mdog can// gang gzhan 
27b7(mdo 'grel): 'bras ni bzang po rnams ro mngar zhu rjes mngar zhing snum// ro tsa bshang gci bas zhing chung // ro rjes bska zhing phan pa dang // yang zhing gcin mang bsil ba yin// de la rtse rno'i nang rtsa snar// mchog yin skom dang 
27b8(mdo 'grel): nyes gsum sel// de yi 'og tu 'bras chen slar// de'i 'og ka lam de'i 'og/ nas 'dra ha yan car ma// de shad ka la sogs ni// ro mngar dri zhim lci la snum// zhu ba'i rjes skur bad mkhris bskyed// bshang dang / 
28a1(mdo 'grel): gci ba thur du 'byin// snga ma snga ma sprad pa yin// 'bras nang drug cu pa mchog ste// rtsa ser shun pa gnag pa dag/ snum zhing 'ju sla bstan zhing mngar// nyes pa gsum sel bsil rtag 
28a2(mdo 'grel): 'dril// de la rim bzhin thub chen dang // shun nag rgya skyugs tshigs pa 'dra// khyi bya'i sgong 'dra 'ang pa'i mig/ phug don 'bras dang su kha ri// bar la deng ut+pal dmar// con ston skyes d+ha d+hAr// gtsun dang kra 
28a3(mdo 'grel): ru bin// yon tan rim bzhin chung zhes bya// 'bras gzhan mngar zhing zhwa rjes skur// mabris pa bskyed cing lci ba dang // gcin drug mang zhing tsha ba yin// pa ta la nyid nyes gsum bskyed// ci tsi khri dang ni bar// khre rgod sde

28a8(mdo 'grel): bkag/ ro bskamangar zhing 'khru ba gcod// zhu rjes tshal bsil zhing yang // tshil dang brag dang mkhris pa la// bskus shing blags dpan pa yin// 'di las mung+ga mchog rlung chung // sran ma shin tu rlung bskyed yin//

32b5(mdo 'grel): sle ma ta'i 'bras bu// ta mal+li shu star ga'i 'bras// mA gu la dang rgya kham dang // a ru ma na paM yal 'bras// rtas byed lci zhing bsil ba yin// lus tsha glo brdol glo gcong sol// khrag dang mkhris pa snyom

32b7(mdo 'grel): gzhungs bcud len 'gyur// patam sogs dro ba dang // bad kan mkhris pa bskyed cing 'khru// sngam zhing mchog tu rlung skyid byed// pi lA ya'i 'bras tshab min// pi lA ya yi tshig gu mngar// re tsa mkhris 
32b8(mdo 'grel): parlung nad sel// rgya shug tshi gu'i yon tan ni// de 'dra skam rlon lud pa sel// bi la 'bras smin pa 'ju dka' zhing // nyis bskyed phyen ni dri ngan byed// ma smin drod bskyed bad rlung sel// de dag gnyi ga 
32b9(mdo 'grel): 'khru ba gcod// ma smin ka ba da mgul nad dang // nyes pa kun bskyed smin pa ni// nyes 'joms skyigs bu slon bro sel// kun kyang 'khru gcod dug 'joms yin// 'dzom bu'i shing tog bshang sr-i l+r-i/ 
33a1(mdo 'grel): bsil zhing shin tu rlung bskyed yin// bshang dang lci ba gnod byed cing // lkog ma la gnod pad mkhris sel// a mra'i 'bras bu ma smin rlung // khrag mkhris skyed byed rus chag pa// 
33a2(mdo 'grel): bad kan mkhris bskyed smin rlung bskyed// lci mngar bad kan bu ba 'phel// bi k+Sha a la nu ba bshang sri// lci tsha bad kan rlung dag 'joms// sha mya tsha lci sgra gnod rtsub// pi lu'i 'bras bu mkhris pa bskyed/ 
33a3(mdo 'grel): bad kan rlung nad sol zhing 'khru// mcher pa gzhang 'brum snyan srin sel// pi lu mngar zhing khab gang // shin tu tsha mi ni nyes gsum 'joms// ba lu shun kha che zhing snum// rlung nad sel bar byed pa yin/ 
33a4(mdo 'grel): pa lung 'bras sha rtas byed mngar// rlung dang mkhris pa sel zhing lci// de yi nang yang skyigs lud pa// dbugs mi bde dang chang na sa la// kha skam rlung dang bdakan dang // drug sra skyug bro yig 'chus// 
33a5(mdo 'grel): sman dang gzhang 'brum gzer nad dang // ma drong chung ba nyid sel to// na ramag 'bras mngar nung sbyar// yi gar 'ong zhing kha zas lan// lci zhing rlung ni rab bskyed pa'i// yon tan ldan par shes par bya/ 
33a6(mdo 'grel): bse shing 'bras bu'i shun pa sha/ khong rdzus byed cing mngaral bsil// de rus me mnyam yid gzungs byed// bad kan rlung ni sel ba'i mchog/ ku shr-i rnam gnyis lcib ste// mngar sgyur bsil dang 
33a7(mdo 'grel): rgyu ba yin// yig 'bye zhing me rab 'bri// bai sha yig 'byed cing mngar// sman pa myur du 'ju bar 'gyur// shin tu tsha man lho nyis bskyed// rkun 'brum pa sha ka dang // ker mar dang bcas rlon sbyar// 
33a8(mdo 'grel): mkhris pa ba dkan bskyed cing 'bru// lci zhing nus tshe rlung 'joms so// rgya shug sgur thung laM gu che// a mra ka ta de bzhin no// e ra ba ti su ra dang // mri ka lin+da dza bir bcas// smin dang kar ma rad skam/ 
33b1(mdo 'grel): mkhris pa shin tu skyed byed min// am+bi ka dang rgya shug sgyur// skam po drang bskyed 'khru ba dang // skom dang ngal dang rmyab sel// yang zhing rlung dang bad kan 'joms// de las 'bras bu kun tha chad// 
33b2(mdo 'grel): li ku rtsi ste nang kun slong // kha ba me dang rlung gnod nyan// sbrul gyi kha chu sogs pas phog/ srin pus zos dang chu nong ljang // sa ngan dus min skyes pa dang // 'bru gzhan 'dres shing mthu nyams/

33b4(mdo 'grel): bilA ma rtogs rlon pa spang // 'bras bu'i sde tshan no// // lan tshwa kun kyang bad kan bskyed// 'phra zhing bshang gci 'byin la 'jam// rlung 'joms 'ju byed tsha zhing no// yi ga 'bye zhing bad mchis bskyed/ 
33b5(mdo 'grel): de la lce myang tsha mngar bcas// ro tsa yid 'ong nyes gsum sel// yang zhing tshal mig lo phan// tsha ba mi skyed me drod bskyed// rtsa bas ru che yang yid 'ong zhing // sgeg pa stong zhing dri zhim la// zhu rjes che zhing

34a1(mdo 'grel): gzhang 'brum dbugs mi bde// lha spros pa kan sel ba yin// sardzi ga sogs thal za thar// dab rnom zhing srid sel yang // zhag mkhris skyed byed smin byed la// gcod cing 
34a2(mdo 'grel): mizhi ma rnam par 'byed// nas tshig 'khus tsha khabs na// mdog mdangs khu ba skra mig gnong // shing kun rlung dang bdakan sal// gzer 'joms mkhris pa skyed dbyed de// zhu rjes ro tsa yi ga 'byed// drong bstsu 
34a3(mdo 'grel): zas 'ju yang ba yin// a ru ra bska 'u rjes mngar// rtsub cing lan tshwa'i ro med yang // drod che zas 'ju yid gzungs byed// na tshod la 'jog dam pa yin// dro zhing 'khru la tshe la pan// blo dang dbang gsal stobs 
34a4(mdo 'grel): rab bskyed// mdze dang bzhin lus mdog mi sdug/ skad 'gags rims rnying mi bzad rims// klad pa mig nad skyu rbab dang // mig ser pho ba'i nad rnams dang // skem bcas 'or dang gcin nad sel/

38a1(mdo 'grel): 'dod pas 'dod pa bden par bya// dpyid ston zhag ni gnyis gnyis nas// so ga dbyar tshe zla phyed cing // gzhan du bud med la zhugs na// mgo 'khor ngal dang bla mthu nyams// stobs dang lus 
38a2(mdo 'grel): gzungs dbang po nyams// dus min 'chi bar byed pa yin// bud med dag la legs bsdams na// dran dang yid gzhungs nad med che// dbang portas shing grag stobs rnams// lhag par 'phel zhing rgas 
38a3(mdo 'grel): srar 'gyur// khrus dang byug pa rlung bsil khar la sogs bza'// chu bsil 'o ma sha khre sran tshed chang dang sa 'thung // nyal po dga' byas 'dod dang bral gyur rjes la brten// de 'dras de yi lus mdangs 
38a4(mdo 'grel): stobs slar skye bar 'gyur// sman pa thos spyod phun tshogs ldan zhing las mkhas snying rje can// gags dang gnod med lus srung byed pa nye bar bzhag byas nas// rgyal po'i rang gi dge ba'i 'bras bu'i longs 
38a5(mdo 'grel): spyod bder spyod cing // nad med mthu dang gzi brjid grags pa yun ring 'phel bar 'gyur// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// mdo'i gnas kyi le'u bdun pa'o// // de nas kha zas kyi tshod 
38a6(mdo 'grel): za ran par bza' ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o// dus kun tu ni tshod zin bza'// de ni mi drod skyed byed yin// rdzas ni lci ba'am yang ba'ang rung // tshad la bltos par bya ba yin// lci ba las ni phyed 'grangs 
38a7(mdo 'grel): bya// yang ba las ni rab 'grangs min// bde blag 'jub de tsam la// tshod zin zhes ni bshad pa yin// zas tshod ma zin chungs 'gyur na// stobs dang gzi mdangs 'phel mi 'gyur// rlung gi nad ni/ 
38a8(mdo 'grel): thams cad kyis// rgyu nyid du ni 'gyur ba yin// tshad las shin tu ches pa yang // nyes pa thams cad myur du bskyed// ma zhu'i zas ni mi bzad pa// de yis rlung sogs gzir gyur pas// cig cang 
38b1(mdo 'grel): rnam par 'khrug 'gyur zhing // de nyid du ni zhugs 'gyur nas// rtsa sgo 'gags shing be snabs bskyed// steng dang 'og gi lam dag tu// bskod pas gsud cing zug byed pa// brkam chags can la 'phral/ 
38b2(mdo 'grel): skyed byed// de la rlung las gzer mgo 'khor// khong spos 'drar zhing rengs sogs 'gyur// mkhris pa las ni 'khru rims 'debs// khong tsha skom zhing kha sogs 'gyur// bad kan rlon zhing yan lag 
38b3(mdo 'grel): lho// tshigs thogs mchil ma mang bar 'gyur// khyad par du ni nyams chung zhing // me drod zhan dang shugs 'gag pa'i// zas ni rlung gis bkag pa dang // bad kan gyis ni rab bkag pa'i// nyes pa be snabs 
38b4(mdo 'grel): 'khrugs pas na// zug rngu zug pa lta bur gnas// 'bru dang smon pa mi byed pas// gzer la sogs pa mi bzad pa// be'u stabs de yin nyes rab drug/ be sbubs me bzad kyis sbubs bkag/ ci ba logs 
38b5(mdo 'grel): dug gi ming can gang yin te// dug gi tshul can myur gsod byed// gso dpyad bya bar dka' bas spang // de nas mazhu'i be snabs gyur// gsor rung shu dag rgya mtsha dang // po son cha bcug chu dron ni/ 
38b6(mdo 'grel): 'thungs pa skyug bcug de nas ni// dugs dang mas btang reng bu dag/ dri ma rlung dag legs rgyu sbyar// yan lag 'bums par gyur pa la// shin tu dugs bya bkri bar bya// gsud nad shin tu 
38b7(mdo 'grel): 'phel ba la// rting par me bca' gdab pa bsngags// de ni de'i nyin bsrung bar bzhag/ khrus btang lta bur nye bar sbar// ma zhu mi bzad nyen 'gyur yang // gzer 'joms sman ni btung bar bya// 
39a1(mdo 'grel): be'u snabs ma zhu me drod nyams// nad kyis sman ni 'ju mi nus// de yis nad pa 'phral du ni// thung zhing 'chi ba dag tu'ang 'gyur// kha zas zhu nas lto ba ni// nub srar gyur la sma/ 
39a2(mdo 'grel): dag kyang // nyes pa'i lhag ma sbyang phyir dang // pho ba'i me ni bskyed phyir btang // ma zhu'i 'gyur ba zhi pa dag/ nyams smad par ni byas las gyur// de gsum nyes pa rnam gsum ni// btags na rab tu 
39a3(mdo 'grel): sbyar bar bya// de la chung la snang ba phan// 'bring la snyung dang zhu bya ba// chen po la ni sbyang pa ste// de yis dri ma rtsa nas 'byin// de bzhin nad ni gzhan dag la'ang // rang nad bzhi las go bzlog pas// 
39a4(mdo 'grel): go so bo de dang rjes 'brel yod// rgyu las go bzlog rnam spang ba// sman pas ji lta ji lta bar// nad pas go bzlog sbyar ba 'am// de'i don byed pa sbyor bar bya// nyes smin me drod skyes gyur na// nyams rta snum 
39a5(mdo 'grel): gyis byug pa dang // btung dang 'jam rtsi sogs rigs sbyar// bad kan ma zhu'i be snabs te// de ni mig dang bu rab sbyangs// sgregs pa zos ma thag 'dra 'byung // mchil ma mang zhing nyes g.yo l+li// 
39a6(mdo 'grel): rlung las rengs bag gzer ba dang // gshang gci 'gagaso shing spos drod nyams// mabris las khong tsha skom mgo 'khor// rmongs bag sgregs pa sbyar zhing tsha// mazhu be snabs snang bar bya// rengs bag 
39a7(mdo 'grel): las ni dugs rab bya// tsha ba'i mthu skyug sman dag/ btang ba 'am gnas skabs gang phan bya// mazhu ba stabs ci ba na// rtsa sbubs thim las yun ring can// bad kan rlung ni 'dris mtshan ma// de dang 
39a8(mdo 'grel): mnyam par bsgrub par bya// dang sa ma lus las zas dang chung // snying na sgregs pa mnam par 'gyur// 'di la cung zad gnyid log bya// mazhu kun gyis nyin par ni// zas ma zos par gnyid log la// 
39b1(mdo 'grel): bkres gyur yang las ran par bza'// ma zhu spyi yi mtshan ma ni// rnam par 'gags sam shas cher 'byung // na zhing rlung ni mi gsal rgyu// mkhreg cing lus lci mgo bo 'khor// zas tshod lhag 
39b2(mdo 'grel): par gyur pa nyid// gcig du ma zhum zad kyi// mi 'dod 'gag byed tshig ma chos// lci dang rtsu ba dang mi gtsang dran// khong cha skam dang chu mang dang // bsres pa'i zas ni 'ju mi 'gyur// mya ngan khro dang 
39b3(mdo 'grel): bkres pa yis// nyes par rdungs shing zas mi 'ju// phan dang mi phan bsres pa dag/ zos pa mnyam za yin par 'dod// 'grangs rjes slar yang za 'gyur ba// lhag par za ba yin zhes bya// 
39b4(mdo 'grel): dus min mapa'am chung zos pa// maM mnam par ni zab yid// gsum po 'das kyang gsod pa'am// mi zad nad kyis 'debs par byed// dus su gopas shing gtsang la pan// snum 
39b5(mdo 'grel): yang dang ma yengs dang // ro drug ldan zhing mngar bag che// shin tu myur min ngal bar min// khrus byas bkres shing dben par gnas// kha gdong lag pa rkang pa bkrus// lha dang yi dgas brjed cing 
39b6(mdo 'grel): sprin// bla ma byis pa mgron mchod byas// dud 'gro rnams kyang rab brtags shing // bdag nyid legs par brtags nas ni// ma smad smra 'am yid 'ong smra// skye bo gtsang zhing gus pas stabs// yid
39b7(mdo 'grel): 'ong gnyen dang lhan cig bza'// zas ni rtsa dang skra spu sogs// 'dres shing khong du slar sros dang // tshod ma zas ngan mang ba dang // tsha ches lan tshwa meng ba spong // phrum dang zho dang phrum skam dang //

40a1(mdo 'grel): bza' mi bya// sa lu'i 'bras dang gro dang nas// drug cu pa dang skam sa'i sha/ a ru skyu ru rgun 'brum dang // mung+ga khar pa to la// zhun mar char chu 'o ma dang // sbrang rtsi se'u 'bru rgya tsha bza'/ 
40a2(mdo 'grel): mig dang stobs phyir mtshan mo ni// 'bras gsum sbrang rtsi mar sar bza'// mi nar 'jog par byed gang dang // nad sel byed pa gang yin bsten// pad rtsa bur shing tso tsa dang // mo tse a mra'i
40a3(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu dang // la du khur ba bu ram can// zas ni lci zhim snyam pa dang // mngar zhing 'ju dka' bstan pa rnams// dang po nyid du bza' bar bya// de las bzlog pa tha mar bza'// bar du skur tsha lan tshwa can// /

40b2(mdo 'grel): nyen// skom spang kun gyis skom 'thungs nas// mang smra lam zhugs nyal ba spang // zan zos nas ni nyi tshan me// rta zhon rgyal dang 'degs pa spang // gshang dang gcigasal snyil dri med//

41a4(mdo 'grel): sman ni gyen du 'gro// phal cher me dang rlung shas che// thur du 'gro ba pal cher ni// sa chu'i yon tan shas che yin// de ltar smin no ro'i bye brag/ 'di yi 'og nas ston pa yin// sman mthul las
