86b8(mdo 'grel): can gzhug/ des na mo mtshan 'jam 'gyur zhing // de yis gzing bzhi par 'gyur// la la phud dang bong nga dkar// rasna shing kun sug smel dang // tsha ba lnga yi phye ma snum// sbyar bri'am lde gu chu bskol blung // de bzhin nad rnams 
87a1(mdo 'grel): 'dzeg pa dang // tshor bzhi phyir zhag gsum ni// pu tse shel dang bo dang dkar// ba sha kha yi shun pa dang // shing kun te dzo pa ti rnams// btags pa'i bye ma 'am bskol ba blud// de nas zhag bdun par du ni// snum nyid ce 
87a2(mdo 'grel): bar btung bar bya// dgongs ka chang ni rnying pa dang // de bzhin legs sbyar chang btung bya// shi ru k+ka ku bar bskol spangs// ras bal mo mtshan nang du gzhug/ brla gzhan gzhan dag gang byung ba// de la rang gi gso ba gso// rlung 'jom 
87a3(mdo 'grel): sman ni 'o mar bskol// zhag bcu'i bar du bza' ba phan// zhag bcu'i bar du sha khu btung // de phan chad ni yang zhing btung // nyung ngu bza' zhing snum bsku dregs// bA la'i til mar la sogs bsten// zla ba bzhi lon phan chad de// de ni 
87a4(mdo 'grel): rim gyis ci bder spyad// pA la'i rtsa ba'i khu ba ni// chu drug 'o ma de mnyam dang // nas dang rgya shug kA lang+tha// rtsa ba bcu pa'i cha gcig dang // bskol ba'i tshe ni char byas pa'i// til mar cha ni bcu bzhi dang // me tha gnyis dang thang shing rtsod// 
87a5(mdo 'grel): ram nye ba gnyis tsan dan dang // thal thes ru rta tsi paka/ rgyas spos rgyam tsha zangs rtsi ba// gla sgang rdo dreg shu dag dang // pun rna ba a ka ru// a sho gan+d+ha nyer shing dang // k+Shi ra ku shu shing mngar dang // ba la ra sa shu ti dang // bar ni gnyis dang 
87a6(mdo 'grel): sug spel dang // shing tsha gan+da ba tra rnams// rib tu btags pa'i lde gu dang // til mar me chung la bskol ba// rlung nad thams cad sel ba'i mchog/ bu bces byis pa rus pa gnad// gnad dang skem la bsngags pa yin// rims// 
87a7(mdo 'grel): skan gdon dang smyo byed dang // gcin nang rgyu ma skyes pa sel// thang la 'bar gyis sngar gyis ni// nad rnams sel ba'i mchog tu bshad// ma ni shi tshe chu sor ni// mngal nas gal te kun 'bar na// de yi skye ba'i dus yin pas// dral 
87a8(mdo 'grel): ti byis pa myur du dbyung // shing mngar ka ko la sa bon dang // pa la s+ya dang thang shing bzhi// til nag sra sru'i rtsa ba dang // btsod dang nye'u shing zhes bya bzhi// br-ik+Sha dang ni pa ya sU// ut+pal thal tres pri yaM ku// bi tsher Tha tre sa ra sna dang / 
87b1(mdo 'grel): pad+ma dza ri shing mngar dang // bri ha tI gnyis tat+pal dang // 'o shing myu gu shun pad mar// bris+t+ra parna bA la dang // shi krug gze ma sle tres dang // shiM ta ta ga dgun padartsa// shing mngar kha ra ka she ru// tshigs bcad phyed kyis rdzogs pa yi// 
87b2(mdo 'grel): bdun po 'di dag 'o mar sbyar// zla ba bdun la rims bzhin du// mngal 'dzag pa le btang bar bya// ka pit+ta dang bil+la dang // br-i ha tI dang bu ram dang // kAN+Da kA ri ba to la'i// rtsa ba bskol bar byas pa dang // de bzhin po ma sha rnams 
87b3(mdo 'grel): ni// zla ba brgyad pa'i tshe na btang // dgu pa thal tres e raN+Da// pa ya s+ya dang shing mngar dang // zla ba bcu par pa yat+ma// 'o ma dang ni bskol ba blud// yang na shing mngar dong gra dang // zang shing 'o mar sbyar ba sbyin// bud med mngal du rlung 
87b4(mdo 'grel): gis klag bsgongs te// gnas pa de ni mngal chags cha 'dra bas// bu chags yin zhes mi mkhas pa dag smra// sman/ rno dros khrag ni 'ba' zhig zags// blun po mngal gnas 'byung pos zos zhes zer// mdangs 'phrog 
87b5(mdo 'grel): yin phyir de lus mngon sum du// 'phrog par mi snang ba 'am 'byung po ni// gzhung 'dod ma ni gtang snyoms 'jog mi bde// lus kyi gnas las le'u gnyis pa'o// // de nas lus kyi yan lag gi bye brag bstan pa
87b6(mdo 'grel): bshad par bya'o// mdor na yan lag rnam drug ste// mgo dang khog pa dpung pa gnyis// brla gnyis yin te de nyid lag/ mig snying lag brkang pa sogs// skra dang reg bya gzugs ro dri// go rim bzhin du na mkha' rlung // 
87b7(mdo 'grel): me chus yi yon tan yin// yon tan re res phyi ma bskyed// de la mkha' la lus bu ga/ rna ba sgra dang khong stong nyid// rlung las reg pa pags dbugs 'byin// me las mig dang gzugs 'ju nyid// chu las lce dang ro dang gsher/ 
87b8(mdo 'grel): sa las swa dri rus pa yin// 'dir ni ma las skyes 'jam khrag/ sha dang rkang dang gzhang kha sogs// pa skyes brtan dang khu chu dang // rtsa bo che sogs sgra rus yin// sems las sems byung dbang po rnams// skyes gnas sna 
88a1(mdo 'grel): tshogs rnams kyang 'byung // goms pa las byung nad med tshe// le lo med stobs gzi' mdangs yid// dngas ma las byung lus skye dang // gnas dang 'phel dang me brkam nyid// snying stobs can gtsang yod par lta// thos dka 
88a2(mdo 'grel): la dga' blo gros ldan// rdul can mang du smra ba dang // nga rgyal tshul 'chos khro phrag dog/ mun pa 'jigs dang mi shes dang // gnyid dang le lo skye ba'o// de ltar 'byung ba'i rang bzhin las// de la khrag skyes pa gas rim bdun// 'o ma las ni 
88a3(mdo 'grel): spris ma bzhin// sman pa'i tshe ni 'byung bar 'gyur// lus zungs gnas ni nad gsher gyi// rang gi drod kyis sman pan// bad kan rgyas pa shams g.yogs// char bshad shing gi snying po 'dra// bdun po de dag gnas bdun ste// dang po khrag 
88a4(mdo 'grel): yin gzhan rim bzhin// bad kan ma zhu ma khris zhu ba// rlung dang gcin gyi gnas su bshad// bud med mngal gnas brgyad pa ste// mthis pa zhu ba'i gnas par gnas// 'di la nang grol yan lag gnas// snying glo mchin mkhris mche 
88a5(mdo 'grel): mkhal ma// pho badrod pa rgyu ma dang // gnye'am long ga lgang pa'o// srog gi gnas ni rnam bcu ste// mgo dang kye yi rtsa ba dang // lkog ma khrag dang snying lte ba// chu so khu chu dngas dang gzhang // lus la rtsa dra chub ste// re re bcu drug yod par 
88a6(mdo 'grel): bshad// pir 'dra drug dang srubs 'dra bdun// po mtshan byed nga mgol brten// de dag btsag bug dab mi rung // sha ye zag pa rnam pa bani// rus pa'i tshogs 'dus bcu bzhi yi// mtshams ni dgra phrag gnyis yod pa// so dang sen mor bcas 
88a7(mdo 'grel): pa yaM// rus pa sum brgya drug cu yin// thang la 'bar rus sum brgyar 'dod// tshigs ni nyis brgya rtsa bcur 'dod// rgyun shes bu ni tshogs kyi grangs// nyis stong dag ni yod par 'dod// rgyus pa dgu brgya skyes pa la// sha ni smar tshad lnga brgya yod// 
88a8(mdo 'grel): bud med kyi ni nu ma dang // mo mtshan la gnas nyi shu lhag/ rtsa chen rtsa ba snying la gnas// de dag kun gyis lus kun kyag// dngas ma'i bdag nyid mdangs su 'gyur// de ni 'byal ba kun dang 'brel// rtsa ba sbom zhing rtse rab pra// lo ma'i rtsa ltar gyes pa 
88b1(mdo 'grel): yin// gyes pa de las rtsa than ni// bdun brgya dag tu gyur pa yin// de la yan lag re re zhing // brgya brgya der ni gnas pa yin// de las dbug par mi bya ba// rtsa yi dra ba 'dzin ces bya// nang na gnas pa'i gsum po yin// rked par bcu drug phrag
88b2(mdo 'grel): gnyis te// de las brla yi rtsa gnyis dang // rkang pa'i gnas rnams gnyis gnyis te// de brgyad btsag bus gdab mi bya// rtsib logs gnyis la rtsa bcu drug/ de las gyen 'gro zhes bya spang // rgyab tu rtsa ni nyi shu bzhi// sgal tshigs
88b3(mdo 'grel): kyi ni ngos gnyis na// de las gnyis gnyis gyen 'gro ba// mtshon gyis gdab par mi bya'o// rgyab bzhin lto ba gnas rtsa dang // pho mtshan steng na gnas pa dang // spu yi 'phreng ba ngos gnyis rtsa// gnyis gnyis mtshon gyis mi gdab// 
88b4(mdo 'grel): bo// brang la gnas pa bzhi bcu las// bcu bzhi dbug par ma bya ste// nu mdzad de yi rtsa ba dang // snying ga dag ni so sor gnyis// gnod bral gnad ni gnyis po dang // migs la zhes bya gnyis kyi gnyis// mgrin pa lhag pa 'dra ba las/ 
88b5(mdo 'grel): sngon po mdzad pa lhag pa dang // 'gal ba dang ni ma mo brgyad// bcu drug yongs su spang bar bya// 'gram pa bcu drug de la gnas// mtshams ni 'brel par byed pa spang // lce yang 'gram pa dang 'dra'o// 'og gi ro tshor byed gnyis dang // 
88b6(mdo 'grel): tshig 'byin byed pa gnyis po spang // sna yi rtsa ni nyi shu bzhi// de la dri tsher byed gnyis dang // rkan du 'gro ba'i rtsa gnyis spang // mig gnyis kyi ni lnga bcu drug/ 'byed dang 'dzum pa'i las byed pa// gnyis gnyis dang ni mig 
88b7(mdo 'grel): 'gram gnyis// drug po de dag spang bar bya// mig dang snar gnas dpral ba la// brten pa'i rtsa ni drug cu las// bzhag pa gcig dang gtsug gi gnyis// skra mtshams gnas pa'i rtsa bzhi ste// bdun po de dag mtshon gdab 
88b8(mdo 'grel): spang // rna bar bcu drug de las 'dir// sgra thos byed pa'i rtsa gnyis spang // de gnyis las ni mur 'gramagyi// mtshams su 'gro ba gnyis po spang // spyi bor bcu gnyis de las ni// gyen 'gro sgra mtshams bdag po las/ 
89a1(mdo 'grel): so so re re spang bar bya// de ltar yan lag re re rtsa// dbye ba dbug pin shes phyir bshad// de la lus la dbug mi rung // ma lus dgu bcu rtsa brgyad yod// dog dang rtsa mdud shin tu phra// yo dang tshigs la gnas mi dbug/ rtsa ni 
89a2(mdo 'grel): bdun brgyad de rnams las// bzhi char khrag ni so sor rgyu// rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan khrag/ nad med khrag ni de ltar nas// de ni lus la phan 'dogs te// gzhan du gnod pa skyed par 'gyur// de la gnag dang dmar dang phra// skad cig re re gang / 
89a3(mdo 'grel): zhing stongs// mgul pa rlung ni khrag rtsa yin// reg na tsha zhing myur du rgyu// mdog sngo ser bar 'dug pa ni// mkhris pa khrag rtsa'i mtshan nyid yin// dkar snam brtan grang bad kon rtsa// 'dres pa'i mtshan nyid 'dren ma yin// mi mngon mnyam 
89a4(mdo 'grel): gnas snum pa dang // mdog dmar khrag rtsa nad med yin// rtsa bo che ni nyi shu bzhi// lte ba la ni brten pa yin// de rnams kyis bskor lte ba yin// 'khor lo po lte brtsibs bskor mtshungs// des ni steng 'og thad ka ru// lus 'di rjes su 
89a5(mdo 'grel): 'dzin pa yin// bu ga sna dang rna ba gnyis// mig gnyis rkub ches po mtshan gyi'o// bud med na ma gnyis khrag sgo// gsum gyis lhag par gyur pa yin// nang gi srog gi gnas gyur pa'i// bug bcu gsum yod par bshad// srog dang 
89a6(mdo 'grel): lus zungs dri ma chu// zas rgya mi mthun bsten pa yis// de las gnod pas nang skyed la// skyon med dag pas bde bar byed// rang gi lus zungs mdog mnyam shing // zlum dang sbom dang phra ba yin// bu ga'i dbyibs ni ring po ste/ 
89a7(mdo 'grel): lo ma'i rtsa 'phros lta bu yin// zas dang spyod lam dag gis gang // nad kyi mthu dang mnyam zur dang // gang yang lus zungs ma mnyam ste// bu ga'i rgyun la gnod byed yin// mang du 'byung ba 'am 'gags pa'am// rtsa ni 
89a8(mdo 'grel): mdud pa chags pa'am// lam gzhan dag tu 'gro ba ni// bu ga'i rgyun 'khrugs mtshan nyid yin// pad+ma'i rtsa ba phra mo las// ring du rgyub byed pa ltar// rang gi dengs mnyer 'phel ba'i// lus kyi sgron bu ga yin// bu ga rnams ni brdol 
89b1(mdo 'grel): 'gyur na// 'dar myos lto spos skrag dang rims// dpal dang gzer dang bshang gci 'gags// yang na 'chi ba nyid du 'gyur// de bas sman pas bu ga brtol// re thag bcad te gso bar bya// 'phral du rma byung cho ga yis// 'bad de zug rngu 
89b2(mdo 'grel): dbyung bar bya// zas 'ju byed pa mkhris pa ni// 'ju byed yin zhes sngar bshad do// nad dang lus zungs dri ma yi// drod yin zhes ni rgyun shes zer// de ni zas kyi gnas yin zhing // 'dzin pas 'dzin byed ces bshad do// de nyid zang
89b3(mdo 'grel): la 'bar gzhung gis// mkhris pas 'dzin pa'i cha ru bshad// tshe dang nad med brtson gzi mdangs// lus zungs ma drod stobs 'phel byed// zhu ba'i gnas kyi sgor zhugs pa// zas kyi lam gyi sgo gtan yin// de ni stobs ldan 
89b4(mdo 'grel): zos pa rnams// zhu nas zur du 'dren par byed// stobs zhan phyir ni kha zas ni// ma smin nyid du 'byung bar byed// 'dzin byed stobs ni me drod de// de yang 'dzin byed stobs can yin// de bas me drod nyams gyur na// 'dzin byed nad ni
89b5(mdo 'grel): skyed par byed// zas gang lus kyi lus zungs mdangs// stobs dang kha dog sogs rgyas byed// de rgyu kha zas me drod ni// mi 'ju dngas ma sogs mi 'gyur// zas ni dus su zos 'gyur ba// lte bar srog ni rlung gis drangs// kom 
89b6(mdo 'grel): gyis gong po rnam par phye// snum gyis mnyen par byas pa yin// mi mnyam gnas kyis bus nas ni// mthu'i gnas na gnas smin byed// phyi yi snod gnas 'bras chu ltar// lto ba'i me yis 'ju bar byed// dang po ro drug zas
89b7(mdo 'grel): kyang ni// mngar ba nyid du gyur nas su// lbu ba can 'gyur bad kan 'gyur// zhu ba'i gnas na po ba na// rnam par 'tshe bas skyur nyid gyur// mkhris 'gyur 'phos pa'i rjes la ni// me drod kyis skams zhu ba dang // kha zhing gong bur gyur 
89b8(mdo 'grel): rlung skyed// sa dang chu dang mi dang rlung // nam mkha' bcas pa'i drod lnga po// rang rang yon tan zas lnga pa'o// sa sogs kyis smin de 'og tu// de dag rang rang ji bzhin rgyas// smin 'byung yon tan tha dad yin// sa ru gtogs pas 
90a1(mdo 'grel): sa nyid dang // lhag mas lus gtogs lhag ma rgyas// zas dezhu ba'i tshogs mdang // dngas ma zhes bya gnyis su 'gyur// de la zas kyi tshogs ma bla// gcin 'gyur bslab pa bshad par 'gyur// dngas ma las khrag 
90a2(mdo 'grel): de las sha/ shalas tshal te de las rus// dus rkang de las khu ba yin// khrab las ni mngal gnas 'gyur// lus zungs tshogs mi rim bzhin du// pad ma khris bu ga'i dri ma dang // rdul dang baspu sen ma dang // mig pags bshang 
90a3(mdo 'grel): snam mdangs yin no// de ltar lus zungs smin pa las// dang sa mtshigs ma gnyis su 'gyur// lus zungs snum ni gcig la gcig/ phan tshun nye bar brten pa yin// zas 'jud ngas ma sogs rim gyis// khu chur 'gyur ba de la/ 
90a4(mdo 'grel): ni// nyin zhag cig 'dod gzhan dag ni// zhag drug kha cig zla gcig 'dod// lus zungs kyi ni zas kyi rgyun// 'khor lo lta bur yongs su 'khor// ro tsa la sogs mthu yis ni// 'phral du khu ba la sogs skyed// phal cher sman gzhan 
90a5(mdo 'grel): nyin zhag ni// gcig gis las rnams byed pa yin// khyab byed kyis dngas lus zungs rnams// 'thor bar byed pa'i las kyis ni// cig car rgyun mi 'chang kun tu// lus la rtag tu rnam par 'thor// gtor che bu ga'i skyon gyis ni// 
90a6(mdo 'grel): dngas ma gang du chags gyur te// der ni gnod pa skyed byed pa// mkha' la sprin chags char 'bab mtshungs// nad kyang ma snyoms gyur pa las// phyogs gcig 'dus na ldang bar 'gyur// de ltar 'byung ba lus zungs me'o// las ni yod 
90a7(mdo 'grel): su bshad pa yin// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung // dngas ma lus zungs rang rang gi/ smin byed kun la zas 'ju'i me// de ni lhag pa yin par 'dod// de ni rtsa ba de 'phel 'phel// zad gyur zad pa'i bdag nyid 'gyur// de bas rigs pas cho ga bzhin// 
90a8(mdo 'grel): zas skom rigs shing phan pa yis// de 'bad pas bsrung gnas gyur na// tshe dang stobs ni gnas par 'gyur// mnyam gnas rang gnas 'dug na gnas// mnyam las gzhan 'gro drod mi snyoms// mkhris pa shas che rno bar 'gyur// 
90b1(mdo 'grel): bad kan gyis gnod me drod chung // me drod mnyam dang mi mnyam no// chung dang de ltar rnam bzhi yin// gang zhig zas ni legs zos pa// legs par 'ju nyid mnyam pa yin// legs par ma zos myur 'ju'am// legs zos ring zhig 'ju 
90b2(mdo 'grel): mimanyam// zas ni legs par ma zos kyang // myur 'dzu me drod rno po yin// zas ni legs par zos gyur kyang // ring nas 'ju zhing kha bskams dang // spo dang rgyu ma 'khrug pa dang // lcib me drod chung ba yin// me drod nyams na 'chi 'gyur// 
90b3(mdo 'grel): cing // skyen med na ni yun ring 'tsho'// ma snyoms nad ni skye 'gyur bas// de phyir me drod gtso bo yin// lus stobs lhan cig skyes pa dang // dus skyes rigs pa las gyur gsum// de la lus sems las byung ba// rang bzhin lhan 
90b4(mdo 'grel): cig skyes pa'i stobs// na tshod dus tshigs las byung ba// dus skyes yin te rig pa las// byung ba spyod lam zas kyis bskyed// de bzhin skyed sbyor las byung ba// yul phyogs shing ri chu nyung ba// skams nad nyung skyed byed yin// rlan can de las// 
90b5(mdo 'grel): bzlog pa yin// cha mnyam thun mong yin par bshad// rkang dang tshe la dang zhag dang gcin// mkhris pa bad kan phyis khrag/ dang so mchu rnams lus gnas yin// snyim pa re res bskyed par bya// dngas dang klang rgyas khu chu ni// re re'ang rang gi khyer gang 
90b6(mdo 'grel): yin// bud med nu zho skem do dang // zla mtshan snyim pa bzhi yod do// lus zungs mnyam gnas tshad 'di yin// de las 'phel dang zad shes bya// khu chu khrag dang sbrum ma'i zas// spyod lam mngal gnas dus tshigs las// gang zhig nyes pa 
90b7(mdo 'grel): lhag 'gyur des// rang bzhin rnam pa bdun du bshad// khyab dang myur bar byed phyir dang // stobs ldan pa dang gzhan ldang byed// rang dbang can dang nad mang phyir// nad rnams phal cher rlung stobs can// de nyid kyis ni rlung gis bskyod pa'i mi rnams/ 
90b8(mdo 'grel): ni/ nad kyi bdag nyid rdul can srag shong pags pags// grang lcags mi bzod brtan bran blo gros spyod mdza' sred// balba dang 'gro ba g.ya zhing smra ba shin tu mang // bad kan nor nyung ci thung gnyid srab dang // gcom chung tshigs thogs g.yo zhing 
91a1(mdo 'grel): skad 'dzed dang // chad lta mang du ba zhing sgeg dang bcas// glu nga rgo dang ngon pas 'thab la dga'// mngang skur kha dang tsha ba'i ngog pas sred// las skye sa dbyibs ring 'gro che sgra dang bcas// maM brtan dbang po mi thul dam pa 
91a2(mdo 'grel): min// bud med mi chags bu mang skyed mi 'gyur// do ya mog ni rngu ba cing rdal gis gang/ Am zhing mdzes 'chi ba lta bu dang // phyer 'ang gcad log lnga bur snang ba yin// da ni shing dang ri 'dzeg mkhar 'phur mi// skal ngan ser sna che zhing khengs 
91a3(mdo 'grel): pa dang // rku zhing byin snying rtsa ring bcas pa dang // kyai dang lnga dang rnga ma bya rgod wa// bya ba'i mtshan nyid ldan pa'i rlung can yin// mkhris pa me 'ang me las byung ba'i phyir// ba bris brgyas pa skom dang bkres shas che// mdog ser lus 
91a4(mdo 'grel): gang lag ga dang yang dam// swa sar smra 'a dpal zhi dmyal che// phreng ba klag brgya la ldag par dag// snor babang gtsang lnga che'i mnyes gzhan pa// 'byeng ldan dral pad tho thos stobs dang ldan// 'jigs can dgra yang 
91a5(mdo 'grel): skyabs 'ongs skyob par byed// yid gzungs tshigs 'tshams sha ni rab tu sna // bud med mi dga' khu ba dang ni 'dod pa chung // gnyer ma'i tshogs dang skra dkar mig spyo dang byur la// zas ni mngar dang kha dang skabasil za bar dga'/ 
91a6(mdo 'grel): then pa mi bzod rdul zhing dri ngal// bshang gci bza' gdung khro dang phrag dog mang // rmil mdong kha ba la sha'i me tog/ glag 'bru byags tshig skar mda' nyi ma mthong // 'di yi lus phra mig seng g.yo ba dang // rje ma srab cing 
91a7(mdo 'grel): 'ang bgrang la dga'// khro dang chang dang nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis// mig ni mAr bar dmar bar 'gyur ba yin// tshe ni ran cing stabs ni 'bring ba dang // mkhas shing sdug bsngal dag las sran drang 'gyur// stag dang dred dang spri 
91a8(mdo 'grel): byi la dang // gnod sbyin rang bzhin ldan pa mkhris can yin// bad kan bsil bas bad kan can bsil cing // rus tshigs mi mngon snam zhing sha rus 'brel// bkres skom nyon mongs sdug bsngal zan pa bzod// blo ldan 
91b1(mdo 'grel): snyi stobs che zhing dam bcas brtan// pr-i yaM ku dang dud+ha'adam bu'i mdog/ tshon dang 'gi wang pad+ma ga ser mdog can// lag dang ring ning brang ni yangs la rgyas// dpral ba'i dbyes che sa ni 'brug cing gnag/ lus 'jam snyoms shing 
91b2(mdo 'grel): yan lag mdzes pa dang // mdangs che lu bcung bu tshag yog 'khor mang // chos ldan tshig nub nam yang smra mi byed// dgral zhe sdang 'dam ring kho na 'dzin byed// glang po'i mchog ni dregs bcas lta bur 'gro// rgya mtsho 'brug dang rdza rnga seng 
91b3(mdo 'grel): ge yi// sgra ldan dran dang brtson 'grus dul bar ldan// byis pa'i tshe na'ang du dang brka pa shas chung // zas ni kha bska tsha dang dro zhing rtsub// nyung ngu zos kyang de ni stobs dang ldan// mig gi mtha' dmar snum zhing dkyus ring yangs// dkar 
91b4(mdo 'grel): gnag rab gsal rdzi ma snyoms dang ldan// sgra dang khwa dang bza' btung spyod pa nyung // tsha ring nor mang ring blta tshig 'jam swa// dad cing blo zab lnga che bzod dang ldan// rang bzhin bzang zhing gnyid che las mtha' ring // byas bzo dang mal 
91b5(mdo 'grel): skal bzang ngo mtshar ldan// bla mal gus mdza' bshes dag la brtan// thi la ma pad+ma b+ha yi 'phreng bar bcas// chu'i gnas dang sprin kyang mthong ba'o// tshangs pa drag po dbang po chu lha dang // na mkha' lding dang dad pa glang po mchog/ de 
91b6(mdo 'grel): bzhin seng ge dang ni khyu mchog dang // bad kan can ni rang bzhin 'drar shes bya// rang bzhin gnyis dang kun las byung // gnyis gnyis kun gyi yon tan bskyed// gtsang sbra yod par smra tshogs kyi// yon tan gyis ni de ldan bshad// 
91b7(mdo 'grel): na tshod bcu drug par byas pa// de las lus zungs dbang po gzi// 'phel 'gyur bdun cu'i bar bar ma// zad pa phan chad rgan po yin// rang rang khru ni phyed dang bzhi// lus ni tshe ring bde ba'i snod// spu med gnag dang shin tu sbom/ 
91b8(mdo 'grel): ring bo nyid ni mi mthun bcas// smad pa brgyad dang rang nyid ldan// gang yin de ni de snod yin// skra ni rab snum 'jam pa dang // phra zhing rtsa ba ma 'dres brtan// dpral ba mtho zhing mur 'gram 'byar// zla ba kham pa 'dra ba bzang // rna brgyab phyogs// 
92a1(mdo 'grel): rgya tshe mdzes// rna shal che zhing sha yis rgyas// mig ni dkar nag 'byes pa dang // rdzi ma 'thug cing stobs pa bzang // sna yi rtse mo dbugs cher 'byung // sha rgyas drang zhing snyoms pa bzang // mchu ni dmar zhing ma 'phyangs 
92a2(mdo 'grel): pa// 'grub pa yangs shing mi 'bur bzang // kha ches yi thags dmal// sdur zhing dkar la 'jam zhing snyems// lce ni dmar zhing yang sa la srab// kos ko che zhing sha yaMs rgyas// mgrin pa zlum zhing sha d+has zlum// pags pa mtho zhing 
92a3(mdo 'grel): sha yis rgyas// lte ba zlum zhing g.yas su 'khyil// rkang lag legs sems 'jam la dmar// snum zhing kun dmar sha rgyas pa// sor mo ridi zlum bu ga med// rgyab zheng che zhing skal tshigs nub// tshigs 'tshams mi mngon dam pa 
92a4(mdo 'grel): dang // tshig gsang mtha' zhing brtan pa dang // mdag snga ma kha dag brtan par gnas// rang bzhin gyis 'byung snying stobs bcan// phongs pa'i tshe yang zhum pa med// mngal gnas brtsams ste nad med pa// gong nas gong du zhing bzang ba// 
92a5(mdo 'grel): shes dang ye shes rgya cher ni// 'phel zhing rim gyis dge bar 'gyur// de ltar yon tan kun ldan pa'i// lus ni ston brgya'i bar dag du// tshe dang dbang phyug 'dod pa yi// dngos po thams cad rab tu gnas// pags pa khrag sogs snying 
92a6(mdo 'grel): stobs par/ brgyad po'i bye ma bzhin du mchog/ skabs dang mde dang shes pa'i sdug/ lus can rnams kyi snying par bshad// snying po kun dang ldan pa ni// mchog tu bkur bar bya bar 'gyur// ma pa kun la'ang bcas dang // bzod ldan 
92a7(mdo 'grel): bzang brtan par 'gyur// dregs dang zhum pa med par ni// bde dang sdug bsngal bsten gyur pa// snying stobs can yin rdul can khengs// mun pa can ni de lta min// sbyin dang tshul khrims snying brtse bde na// tshangs par spyod dang byas pa bzo/ 
92a8(mdo 'grel): byams ldan bcud kyis len rten pa// tshe dang bsod rnams 'phel ba'i sde'o// lus kyi gnas las la 'u gsum pa'o// / de nas lus kyi gnad kyi bye brag bston pa bshad par bya'o// gnad ni brgya las bdun lhag po// de las bcu gcig 
92b1(mdo 'grel): badra dang ni// de bzhin la gang gnyis so song // lto ba la gsum zang la dgu// rgyab la bcu bzhin mtshad ni// yan chad sum cu bdun yod// nang pa'i mthil na gung pa yi// bad kan ni mamal 'phrog pa// gnad yod ces ni rnams shad de// 
92b2(mdo 'grel): depu gnad kyis 'chi bar 'gyur// mtheb sor dbus na rgya tshogs te// dbug bskyed pa'i nad kyis 'chi// dgong sor gnyis par shes bya// rkang pa 'khor zhing 'dar bar byed// long mo'i tshogs 'og par mgo ste// de bcad skang dang 
92b3(mdo 'grel): nad skyed byed// byin pa rkang pa gnyis kyi bar// long mo gnad rengs bems par byed// byin pa'i nang na ka zhes pa// khrag zad pa yis 'tsha bar byed// byin pa brla mtshams pus ma ste// de phug gson yang 'azang por 'gyur// pus gong 
92b4(mdo 'grel): sang gsum pa gzhan gad// de mug pan rangs snang bar byed // badz+ra zhi badrad pa nas byab// de drag zag pa dbarnam mas byur// bdan mig dpa gis byu // zag zad pas ni gnags byed 'ams// brter rnag pa 
92b5(mdo 'grel): bar gyi gnad// ljon shing zhes bya ma ning byed// de dag brla yi dpung de bzhin// mkhrig ma 'dir ni long mor mtshungs// gra mo byi 'dra gnyis phug/ zha bo ljon shing 'dra ba ni// mtshan khung nang na mtshan khung 'dzin// de pug zhas 
92b6(mdo 'grel): da du 'byung // ling ka'i gnad ni gnang zhes bya// de phrag gzhang rlung gis 'phral gsod// lgang pa gzhu ltar yo ba yai// chu sa'i gnad ni sha khrag zung // dbus na khe cig thur du ltas// rked pa'i dbus gnas srog 'phral 'joms 
92b7(mdo 'grel): rde'u byen rma bug gnas ma gtogs// der yang ngos gnyis dbug 'ang // gcin 'jig gnas dang gcig dbug/ ma ni 'tsho ba shin tu dka'// lus kyi zhu dang mnu'i gnas// dbus na lte brtse kun gyi// rten yin de'ang 'phral gsod byed// mthu 
92b8(mdo 'grel): pa yi gnas sgor gyur// 'dod chags sogs gnas snying zhes bya// brang dang nu ma lto dbus gnas// nu mjid nu ma'i rtsa zhes bya// steng 'og ser gnyis nu ma'i gnad// dbug bad kan khrag gis ni// rim bzhin lto 'gyings 'jig par byed// 
93a1(mdo 'grel): rangs bral brang gi ngos gnyin// rtsa sbubs gnyis bor rlung rgyu ba// de phug khong pa khrag gis gang // lud pa dbugs mi bde bas 'chi// rgyab kyi sgal tshigs brang gi bar// de gnyis kyi ni ngos gnyis na// phrag pa gnyis kyi 
93a2(mdo 'grel): logs na ni// migasal zhes bya'i gnad gnyis yod// de gnyis phug pas khong pa ni// khrag khengs brnag ste 'chi bar byed// sgal tshigs kyi ni ngos gnyis na// rked pa cha gnyis la gnas dang // rkub ces lhag gnas sgal tshigs 
93a3(mdo 'grel): rten// rked pa can dang gzhon nur bshad// de snang khrag zad skya rbab dang // gzugs nyams pas ni 'chi bar 'gyur// rgyab kyi sgal tshigs ngos gnyis kyi// rked pa'i mtshams ni gang yin pa// ro smad kyi ni rgyab phyogs na// khud bu zhes bya'i/ 
93a4(mdo 'grel): gnad gnyis yod// de skad bskyod pa nyams pa dang // ro smad tshor ba med par 'gyur// gang zhig rtsib logs gnyis dang 'brel// sta zur rtse mo gnyis steng gi/ gnas ni g.yogs par gyur pa dag/ ro rmad gzhon nu'i rus par gnas// 
93a5(mdo 'grel): de skad ro smad skrangs par byed// nyam chung 'chi ba nyid du 'gyur// rtsib logs gnyis kyi nang dang 'brel// rked pa'i ngos gnyis dbus na gnas// thad ka nang ni gyen gnas pa// rtsib logs mtshams su de phug na// khong pa khrag gis 
93a6(mdo 'grel): gang ba dang // lus dang bral ba nyid du 'gyur// nu ma gnyis kyi thad kyi cha// rgyab kyi sgal tshigs la brten pa// rtsa chen zhes byad de phug na// khrag zad nas ni 'chi bar byed// dpung mgo gnyis dang 'brel ba dang // sgal tshigs kyi ni ngos gnyis 
93a7(mdo 'grel): na// phrag pa gnyis kyi sogs pa ste// de snad skams shing tshor bral 'gyur// mgrin pa gnyis kyi ngos gnyis kyi// dpung mgo dang ni mgrin pa'i bar// phrag par phrag pa la brten gnang // de phug lag pa bya ba nyams// srol gong gi ni ngos 
93a8(mdo 'grel): gnyis na// 'gram pa la ni brten pa'i rtsa// bzhi ste de la sngon po gnyis// gnyis po mdzang pa'i gnad du bshad/ de bug sad 'gags mi sdug 'gyur // lce yis don tshor ba med// lkog ma'i sbubs kyi ngos gnyis na// lceng dang snang ni 
93b1(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba'i rtsa// so sor bzhi bzhi yod ma mo// de bcad 'phral du srog 'joms so// mgo bo ni mtshams lhag pa ste// de phrag mgo bo ldem por 'gyur// rna ba gnyis 'og lto pa na// na rtsa zhes bya 'on par 'gyur// sna yi bug gnyis/ 
93b2(mdo 'grel): dang ni// rna ba'i lam 'gro mgrin nad gnas// sprul mge zhes bya de bcad na// dri ma tor bar byed par 'gyur// mig gnyis kyi ni phyi rol mtshams// spa ma skyes pa yi mtha' 'og/ mig zung smin steng dma' bar gnas/ 
93b3(mdo 'grel): 'khyil pa phug pas long bar 'gyur// na mtshan dpral ba'i nang na ni// mur 'gram ces bya 'bral 'chi byed// mu 'gram gnyis te sa mtshams na// 'deg pa zhes byo gnag pa'ang // smin mtshams par gnas gsum chang la'ang / 
93b4(mdo 'grel): zug rngu dag ni ma phyung zhing // sman nas rang nyid byung nas 'tsho// phyung na 'phral du 'chi bar 'gyur// lce mig sna dang rna ba yi// bu ga'i bzhi ni 'dus pa dag/ rkan dang sgo ru kha bzhin ste// bu ga'i gnad ni de rnams kyi// gnad ni sum mdo 
93b5(mdo 'grel): ris zhes bya// de bcad srog ni 'phral du 'dor// thod pa'i ni mtshams lnga pa'o// thad ka byin 'gro mtshams kyi mtha'// de snad pas ni mgo 'khor dang // spro zhing dran pa nyams ste 'chi// spyi bo'i steng du gtsug 'khyil pa'i// rtsa dang

93b8(mdo 'grel): 'phrog nu rtsa nu mjing ngo // rus pa'i gnad brgyad mur 'gram dang // byed pa can dang gzhon nu dang // ro smad dang ni sogs pa'o// rgyus pa'i gnad ni nyi shu gsum// gnyen gong shes bya pir dang ni// pir mgo mig zur rgya tshigs dang // phrag pa

94b1(mdo 'grel): chen gyi// ro smad nu mjing sum cu gsum// zla ba 'am zla phyed gson nas ni// dus gzhan du ni 'chi bar byed// bdeg dang bzhag pa zhes bya gsum// der ni zug rngu phyung gyur na// rlung gis sha dang tshil dang rkang // klad rgyas rnams ni skyems par

101b2(mdo 'grel): par rmis pa dang // khA dang bya rgod tshogs kyis bskor// de bzhin yi dgas sha za mo// byad ma rme sha can gyis bskor// 'od ma'i tshal dang tshor ma dang // rtsa yi tshang tshong nang du chud// g.yang sar lhung dang dur khrod zhal// phyag dar thal 
101b3(mdo 'grel): ba'i nang du lhung // chu dang 'dam la sogs par nub// chu rkun gyis ni myur du khyed// klu gar dang ni rol mo byed// gos dang phreng ba dmar po 'chang // lus 'phel na tshod rgyas pa dang // bag ma lan zhing kha spu 'dreg/ zas btsos snum 
101b4(mdo 'grel): za chang 'thung dang // skyug dang 'khru ba rmi ba dang // lcags dang gser dag rnyed pa dang // btsongs dang brtsod las phan pa dang // mchil lha ma gnyis ni stor ba dang // rkang lpags ldang ba rmi ba dang // shin tu dga' dang rab khros pa'i// shi ba'i 
101b5(mdo 'grel): gnyen gyis smyos pa dang // mar me gza' dang skar ma dang // so mig lha yi gzugs rnams ni// lhang ba'am 'jig pa rmis pa 'am// ri bo ral bar gyur pa dang // nag tshal dmar ba'i nang dang ni// sdig can khyim du 'jug pa dang // ro ba sreg+sa 
101b6(mdo 'grel): sa dang mun par zhugs// ma yi mngal du zhugs pa dang // brag dang khar pa sa ljang dang // de bzhin nya yis mid pa dang // chos gos gyon pa'i mi srun dang // gcer bu pa dang dbyig thogs dang // mig dmar kha dog nag pa ni// mthong ba 
101b7(mdo 'grel): nam yang shis ma yin// bud med sdig can gdong gnag dang // skra dang sen mo nu ma ring // gos dang phreng ba dmar po thogs// rmis pa dus mtshan yin par 'dod// nad ni stobs dang ldan pa yis// yid 'jug bug 'gag pa'i phyir// 
101b8(mdo 'grel): mi bzad rmi lam mthor gyur te// nad pa 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin// nad med the tshom bcas gyur zhing // 'ga' zhig zar bar 'gyur ba yin// mthong dang thos dang nyams myong dang // gsol ba btab dang brtags pa dang // 'byung bar gyur dang 
102a1(mdo 'grel): nad las 'byung // rmi la ma rnam pa bdun du bshad// de las dang po'i lnga po dang // nga gi rang bzhin nyin mo brjed// shin tu zung 'bras bu med// cha 'dres pa yi rang bzhin la// cha 'dres pa yi rang bzhin can// mtshan stod tshi la ma 'bras bu ring / 
102a2(mdo 'grel): mthong ba chung du byed pa yin// nang bar mthong dang gnyid ma log/ ma mthun gtam gyis bar mchad// de yi rten par 'bras chen 'gyur// sbyin dang sbyin sreg la sogs kyis// rmi lam 'bras bu chung bar 'gyur// gang zhig rmi la ma ngan 
102a3(mdo 'grel): mthong nas// smar yang gnas skabs de nyid du// rmil ma bzang ba mthong gyur na// 'bras bu bzang po nyid thob 'gyung// lha dang bram na mchog dang // b.lang rgyal po mdza shes gson// skyes bu dam bkrugs ldan dang // me nga 
102a4(mdo 'grel): ba dang nga pa' tshe// bu mo rtse'u sa pa dang // gis dkar rgyan zhid mdangs dang ldan// skyes bu za ba lus 'byung da // zug gis lus kun byugs pa dag/ gang gis mthong ba zlar pa dang // gdugs dang garnyan ma yang du/ 
102a5(mdo 'grel): mdakar po gos dang ni// me gtsang gis byugs 'bras bu rnyed// ri bo khang bzang 'bras bcas shing // 'dzeg dang seng ge glang chen mi// na dang ba lang dag la zhon// chu bo mtsho bran rgya mtsho brgal// shar dang byar du 'gro ba dang / 
102a6(mdo 'grel): bgrod min 'gro dang shi ba dang // nya mar las thar lha rnams dang // pha mas mngon par bstod pa dang // du dang lhung las ldang ba dang // dgra bo 'pham par byas pa dag/ gang rmis tshe ring nad med dang // nor mang po ni rnyed par 'gyur// 
102a7(mdo 'grel): de bzhin nad pa'i g.yog 'khor ni// bkra shis cho ga phun sum tshogs// dad ldan rjes su mthun pa dang // nor mang bsdus par gyur pa dang // snying stobs mtshan nyid dang ldan zhing // sman pa bram ze sogs la gus// gso byas 
102a8(mdo 'grel): rnams la skyo ba med// de ni nad med gyur mtshan nyid// rtag tu shis pa bsdus pa dang // bkra mi shes pa rnam par yod// 'di dag 'di nyid mthong ba yi// drang srong rnams kyis shis par bshad// de ltar 'di ni skye dang 'chi// 
102b1(mdo 'grel): mtshan nyid ga daphyer bshad pas na// de byer lus kyi gnas yin pas// 'di ni lus kyi gnas su bshad// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// lus kyi gnas kyi le'u drug pa'o// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po 
102b2(mdo 'grel): bsdus pa las// lus kyi gnas te gnas gnyis pa rdzogs so// de nas nad thams cad kyi na dag ni bshad par bya'o// de yang rgyun shes kyi bul sogs pa rnams kyis// 'di skad ces bshad do// nad dang sdig pa rims 
102b3(mdo 'grel): gnod byed// 'gyur byed sdug bsngal ma thu'i skyon// zar byed 'tshe dka' 'bun gnod bskyed/ ming gi rnam grangs skra bshad do// nad gzhi sngar 'byung tshul dang ni// de bzhin tshul phyed goms byed dang // dkyil gyur shes par bya ba 
102b4(mdo 'grel): ste// nad ni rnam pa ldang shis bya// gzhi dang rgyu deng skye mched dang // rkyen dang skong bar byed pa'i rgyu/ rnam grangs kyis ni nad gzhi bshad// gang gis sngar byung tshul shes pas// nad ni 'byung bar 'dod gyur la// bye brag phyed par ma 
102b5(mdo 'grel): gyur pa// nad kyi tshul ni ji bzhin par// chung phyir mtshan nyid mi gsal ba'o// de nyid gsal ba nyid gyur pa// tshul phyed pa zhes bya bar bshad// dbyibs dang gsal mngon rtags dang ni// mtshan nyid mtshan ma rnams yin no// rgyu dang 
102b6(mdo 'grel): nad ni mi mthun zhing // mi mthun pa yi don byed pa'i// sman dang zas dang spyod lam rnams// nye bar bsgyur bas bde 'gyur ba// nyam rtas byed par shes bya ste// de ni goms pa zhes byar bshad// de las bzlog pa'i mgoms nang / 
102b7(mdo 'grel): mi 'phrod nad ces bya ba'o// gang gi nad ni dkyil gyur pas// ji bzhin rjes su 'phel 'gyur zhing // nad rnams rdzogs shing mngon gyur pa// skyes shing 'ong ba dkyil gyur yin// de ni thang btag gtso bo dang // stobs dang dus kyis phye ba yin// 
102b8(mdo 'grel): grangs ni ji ltar 'di nyid las// rim ni brgyad du bshad pa yin// nad rnams spyid ni bsdus pa yin// cha shas dbye ba brtag pa yin// rang dbang gzhan dbang gnyis las ni// nad rnams gtso borang bshad pa yin// rgyu sogs malus 
103a1(mdo 'grel): phyogs gcig las// stobs ni che chung shes par bya// nyin mtshan dus dang zas zos chas// nyes pa ji bzhin nad kyi dus// de ltar nad gzhi'i don bshad nas// de ni rgyas par bshad par bya// nad rnams kun gyi nad gzhi 
103a2(mdo 'grel): ni// nad ni 'khrugs par gyur pa yin// de ni gnod 'gyur sna tshogs pa// brten pas ldang bar 'gyur bar bshad// gsum po'i sbyor ba rnam pa gsum// gnod 'gyur lngar ni bshad pa yin// kha dang tshe dang bsku cung zad// nub dang bcud
103a3(mdo 'grel): med sra ba dang // bkag dang nan gyis btsong ba dang // mtshan mo mi nyal skad cher sma// bya ba'i sbyor drags mya ngan 'jigs// sems las drag shul bud med drags// so gnyin mtshan zas zhu'i rjes// rlung gi nad ni ldang bar 'gyur/ 
103a4(mdo 'grel): mkhris pa tsha dang skyur dang no// lan tsha khro dang lus tshe dang // ston ka nyi phyed mtshan phyed dang // che ba'i dus su ldang bar 'gyur// mngar skur lan che snum pa dang // lci dang bad kan skyes bsil dang // 'dug dang bde dang gnyid man// nyin par 
103a5(mdo 'grel): gnyid log brtas grags dang // smon sogs sbyor ba nyes pa dang // zos ma thag dang dpyid kyi dus// snga dro mtshan stod bad kan ldang // 'dres pa las ni ldan pa yin// thams cad bsten pas 'dus par 'gyur// de bzhin gzhan yang/ 
103a6(mdo 'grel): 'dren mar zos// ma zhu ma snyoms mi 'phrod dang // lhag par zos pa la sogs dang // chang dang btung ba nyes pa dang // tshod ma skam dang la phug rjen// til tshigs sa zhag so ba'i chang // sha ru la sha skam sha ri de rnams// de dang de yis nyes 
103a7(mdo 'grel): gsum bskyed// de bzhin kha zas spos pa dang // dus tshigs log pa bdun gyi rlung // gdon zhugs dug dang dbyig dug zos// be'u snabs nad 'khrugs ri rtsar gnas// btsas skar la ni gza' zhugs dang // log par sbyor ba sna 
103a8(mdo 'grel): tshogs dang // sdig pa'i las la sbyor ba dang // bud med bu btsas log par byung // gso ba log par byas las ldang // de ltar so so'i nad ldang bas// nad kyi gnas su 'gro byed pa// rtsa sbugs rnams su phyin pa dang // nad rnams lus 
103b1(mdo 'grel): la myur du bskyed// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u dang po'o// // de nas rims kyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o// rims ni nad bdag sdig can dang // 'chi bdag mdangs za 'chi byed 
103b2(mdo 'grel): yin// khros pas myur ba'i mchod sbyin brlag/ drag po dpral ba'i mig las byung // skye dang 'chi tshe rmongs byed pa// mi 'phrod sna tshogs brtan las byung // me bzad ming ni sna tshogs pas// skye gnas du ma rnams la gnas// 
103b3(mdo 'grel): de ni nad rnams so sor 'dres// 'dus dang glo bur las brgyad gyur// de la nad rnams rong rang ni// rgyu las 'khrugs te ldang ba yis// mthu'i gnas su zhugs gyur pa// lhan cig gnas nas rtsa sgo bkag/ zhu ba'i gnas nas 
103b4(mdo 'grel): ma drad na// phyi rol tu ni 'byin par byed// de dang lhan cig mngon khyab nas// lus kun tsha bar byed pa yin// yan lag shin tu cha byed pas// rims ni de yis skyed par byed// rtsa sgo bkag pas de 'og tu// rdul ni mang du mi 
103b5(mdo 'grel): 'byung ngo // de yis sngon tshul skyed zhan dang // nyams mi dga' zhing lus lhal// ri mo tshor zhing yig 'chus// glal byung mig 'khrug mchi mar bcas// yan lag ni zhing 'ju stobs chung // nyams chung gnyid ni che ba dang // swA ldang// 
103b6(mdo 'grel): bya stangs byed 'dod dang // byin pa'i nyan lus snyom dang // phan par bstan pa mi bzod khro// skur dang tsha dang drod la phred// kha zas mngar po la mi dga'// byis pa la sdang skom dad che// sgra me grang lhags rlung dang chu// grib ma nyi mtshan 
103b7(mdo 'grel): rgyu med par// dga' dang mi dga' dag tu byed// de rjes rams ni gsal bar 'gyur// rims thebs 'jang nye'i tshe nad thabs// chung zhing tsha ba mi snyoms la// yan lag de dang der 'pho zhing // na ba de dang de gser 'gyur// rkang pa 
103b8(mdo 'grel): bems po rengs pa dang // byin snying na zhing ngal ba dang // tshigs rnams bye ba lta bur shes// brla dang rked pa na ba dang // rgyab ni brdungs pa ltar sems dang // lto ba btsir ba snyam sems dang // rus pa bcag pa snyam pa dang // rtsib ma 
104a1(mdo 'grel): lhag par na ba dang // snying ni btsir snyam sems shing zug/ zang du btsugs pa lta bung gzer// zag pa brdungs snyam dpung pa ni// bcom snyam sems shing sgrog rus na// 'gram pas kha zas ldang mi nus// 
104a2(mdo 'grel): glal 'byung rna bsgra dang bcas// mung 'gram thug cing mag ban// lce yas ran ma chir ba 'am// yang na 'bas tha bang 'byur// dri ma rnams ni srid pa dang // pags mig la dang sen ma dang // bshang sgran ba cang dper ba dang / 
104a3(mdo 'grel): mchil mi yi ga'i chus srid chung // zas mi 'ju zhing rdul ma'i byung // gnyid yang mchu dang grib skam// skom dang che zhing lud pa bskams// lud pa lu zhing skyugs pa bskams// sems zhum lus kyi bo spu ljang // pags pas 
104a4(mdo 'grel): dag rtse ba dang // lag 'dang shing skyed pa thogs// mgo' bang tshig ni brla ba dang // drod pagal dga' bya skang byed// rlung gi rims su shes par bya// lus kun cig cang khyab pa dang // glal zhing kha rokha ba dang // bosi la 'dod pa sngar 
104a5(mdo 'grel): thong bu 'byung // mgo 'khor brgyal myos snying mi dga'// bshang smra mkhris parlon pa dang // mchil ma khrag bcas skrag pa skrag/ thong bu dmar po 'byung ba dang // pags pa la sogs sar rtsa sngo// rdul 'byung dbugs ni mnam 
104a6(mdo 'grel): dang // ske mi dang rab che mkhris pa'i rims// lhag par yig 'chus shing rmongs// bug 'gag cing rims shugs dal// mchil mkhan dmar pa bro// dang kha lhag cing dbugs mi bde// cham btab snying na skyug pa 'byung // lud 
104a7(mdo 'grel): lus rangs pags sogs skye// yan lagazor bu zad mo 'byung // snyom zhing lus 'dang bdakan rims// rang gi dus su thams cad ni// 'byung zhing 'phel ba nyid gyur pa// nad gzhir bshad pa'i mi mthun bsten// bsgyur bas bde 
104a8(mdo 'grel): bar byed pa yin/ nga rang mtshan ma 'dres pa ni// ldan pa'i rims yin gzhan yang ni// mgon brgyal smon lus tsha blangs bag 'gyur// gre ba 'i bskams mi dga' dus tshigs na// gnyid med mgo 'khor spa ldang ske ma dang ci// bzlas 
104b1(mdo 'grel): tshig ma rlung mkhris 'dres pa'i rims// tsha med yig 'chus shing glang tshigs na// cham pa lung pa dbugs mi bde bshang sra// khong bsil rnyongs bag ba rib mgo 'khor mya// bad kan rlung 'dres rims kyi mtshan ma yin// pus rdul 
104b2(mdo 'grel): rengs dang tsha bsil sor mi gnas// skom dang lud pa bad kan mkhris bag 'byung // rmongs bag spro dang kha grol dri chags// bad kan mkhris pa 'dres pa'i rims kyi rtags// kun nas 'byung brtags kun ldan// 'dir yang thang re tshab 
104b3(mdo 'grel): ldang // de bzhin drang dang nyin mo ni// gnyid che mtshan mo gnyid chung ba 'am// rtag par gnyid 'ong ba 'am yang // rdul cher 'byung ba'ang rdul mi 'byung // glu dang gar dang rgod sogs pa// spyod pa ngan pa la 'jug cing // mig dmar mchi ma 'dzag 
104b4(mdo 'grel): dang bcas// zhum zhing mchi ma 'khrugs par snang // byin snying rtseg lobs na pa dang // mgo bo rus tshigs na mgo 'khor// rna ba sgra dang nad dang bcas// mgul pa grams gang snyam sems// lce rtsub kun nas bsregs ltar snang // lus kyi 
104b5(mdo 'grel): tshishes ni khyimamasams/ ky-i yang 'gas kyis nga / gas zhid sa da // 'dus / nga gan su d+hA ba 'jug/ sman pa den sa ma// na nga ba'i mang ma 
104b6(mdo 'grel): 'byung // kha nang snum zhing nyams stobs chung // bcom chung 'gyur zhing slu ba dang // nad smin dkar zhing rmugs pa dang // rgyun du gre ba 'dzer ba ni// 'dus pa'i rims te mngon thugs byed// de ni mdangs 'phrog ces kyang bshad// nad kyis 
104b7(mdo 'grel): bkag cing me drod nyams// mtshan ma thams cad rdzogs 'gyur ba// gsor mi rung ste de las gzhan// gso dka' 'am dbang po mtshar 'gyur// gzhan yang 'dus pa las byung ba// gang du mkhris pa logs shig gnas// pags pa/ 
104b8(mdo 'grel): 'amanang grol tsha ba dag/ 'debs pa 'am tsha bsnga phyi 'byung // de bzhin bad kan rlung grang ba// de gnyis tsha lngags dka' yin// drang lnga de ni mkhris pa yis// bad kan gsher ba bskams pa dang // grang bzhi byas kha sbyar brgyal// mos dang / 
105a1(mdo 'grel): shAH// skom dang che bar 'gyur// tsha ba sngan de rjes la// rmugs rlon mchil mkhan mAm 'gyur// glo bur drag shul las byung dang // mngon zer byad byas dmod 'byung bzhi// de la smad dpyad mes tshig sogs// dal ba drag shul las/ 
105a2(mdo 'grel): nga yin// de ni phal nar rlung nad kyis// khrag ni gnod cing 'khrugs byas pas// na bcas mdog nyams spangs dang bcas// zug gzer bcas pa'i rims bskyed 'gyur// gdon zhugs sman gyi dri dang drag/ khros 'jigs mya ngan 
105a3(mdo 'grel): 'dod las byung // mngon par zin las byung rims yin// 'dir rton rgyu med rgod cing du// sman gyi dri skyes brgyal ba dang // sbrid pa klang nang skrangs par 'gyur// dug las brgyal dang tshad pas 'khru// mdog gnag lus tshe snying nad 'gyur 
105a4(mdo 'grel): khros las lus 'dang klad nad 'gyur// mya ngan 'jigs las gla bar 'gyur// 'dad las mag 'khar yod 'grus kyi// che gnyid zla brtan nyams 'byur// gdan la sogs pa'i 'das pa'i rims// 'jigs sogs gsam rgya 
105a5(mdo 'grel): ge rims// khro las mkhris pa ldang bar 'gyur// dmad pa byad byas las byung gang // 'dus pa'i rims na mi bzad pa// de ni shan tu bzod dkar bshad// de la byang byas sngags kyis ni// sbyin sreg byas pa bzhin du cha// thog mar 
105a6(mdo 'grel): sems 'bab de 'og lus// de nas thor bu mgo 'khor skom// tsha bcas rgyal bas zin 'gyur ba'i// rims ni nyin re bzhin du 'phel// de ltar rims ni brgyad du bshad// de dag mdor na rnams gnyis te// lus dang sems kyi rims dang ni// 
105a7(mdo 'grel): grang dang tshab phyi nang gnas// rang bzhin dang ni gyur pa dang // gsor rung gser mi rung ba dang // smin dang ma smin zhes bya'o// lus rims thog mar lus tsha byed// sems kyi dang po snying tsha 'gyur// rlung dang bad kan cig car ni// 'byung tshe grang 
105a8(mdo 'grel): ba'i rims su 'gyur// mkhris pa dang ldan tshab ste// 'dres las 'dres pa'o nang gnas pa// rims nad dkyil ni bskyed 'gyur nas// nang na tsha zhing bshang gci sri// phyi rol rims ni che ba dang // phyi rol gnas pags par swa/ 
105b1(mdo 'grel): dbyar dang ston dang dpyid dus su// rlung sogs rims 'byung rang bzhin rims// gzhan du gyur pa de gso dka'// phal cher rlung ni rang bzhin rims// yin yang gso bar dka' ba yin// dbyar dus rlung nad ldang 'gyur na// 
105b2(mdo 'grel): mkhris pa bad kan ldan rims 'gyur// stostan ga mkhris pa nad slong ste// bad kan de yi grogs byed 'gyur// der ni bsrung ba byas gyur yang // gnod par 'gyur ba ma yin no// bad kan dpyid ldang de yang ni// de rjes rlung dang mkhris 
105b3(mdo 'grel): pa 'byung // nyams stobs che zhing nad stobs chung // brla gnyan med rims gse bar sla// rnams kun 'gyur ba shes bya bar// gsor mi rlung ba sngar bshad do// rims kyis nad tshabs che zhing tshe// khong rgya ma yin gcin mang dang // 
105b4(mdo 'grel): bshang gci kha zas mi 'jul// bkres chung ma smin rims mtshan nyid// rims shugs stobs che skem dad che// bla zhing mgo 'khor dbugs mi bde// bshang gci bder 'byung nad bskyod pa// smin par 'gyur ba'i mtshan 
105b5(mdo 'grel): ma yin// ma smin go bzlog mtshan nyid dang // zhag 'dun bskud byas la sbyi/ ba shad// rims ni nad ci dus dang // stabs chung tshalas rnams ldang bshad// phal cher 'dus par byungar po // dmas su mang du 'byur bar 
105b6(mdo 'grel): bshad/ rgyun dang rtag pa nyin gcig pa// nyin gsum pa dang nyin bzhi pa'o// lus zungs bshang gci rgyu ba yi// bu ga nad kyis khyab byas pa'i// lus kun tsha bar gyur nas ni// gnod byas sogs dang mnyam par 
105b7(mdo 'grel): 'phel// stobs che lus lci rkang lag rengs// khyad par du ni dngas mar gnas// gnyen pos bcos dka' bzod par dka'// rgyun gyi rims su 'gyur ba yin// de yi drod kyi dri ma dang // lus zungs myur du zad par byed// de 'og rnam kun 
105b8(mdo 'grel): lus gzungs sogs// dag pa 'am ma dag rims kyis ni// rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan nag/ bdun rnam bcu 'am bcu gnyis gnas// phal cher mtshams las mi 'da' bar// 'tsho ba 'am 'chi ba dag tu byed// da skad ma bzhin 'ju/ 
106a1(mdo 'grel): gis bshad// ljang sngon gyis ni bshad pa'i gzhung // bdun pa nyis lngab gyur pa yin// de bzhin dgu dang bcu gcig lngab// 'di ni nad gzhi gsum gyi tshigs// 'tsho dang 'chi bar byed pa yin// rims dus dag dang ma dag
106a2(mdo 'grel): las// yun ring dus su'ang gnas pa yin// nad rtse zhil ba nyam chung dang // kha zas mi 'phrod sogs bsten pas// nad dkyil chung yang gnod byas sogs// brten te stobs che nyid gyur las// gnyen por bcas shing 'phel 'brir 
106a3(mdo 'grel): gnas// mi bzad pa ni nyid du 'gyur// de rnams kyi ni nad kyi stobs// rang gi dus su rims stobs skye// slar yang de dag bcos thabs kyis// stobs che chung las ldog par byed// nad zad rims ni phar gyur pa// bcud la sogs pa 
106a4(mdo 'grel): mas sa / ma / sa lasags sa pa ste/ / A l+h+wa / sa 
106a5(mdo 'grel): byu// delasu bzlog pa ches skye / rnams rgyam pa // ma na yAM/ gal ga sa/ jug pa mas ni meng pa ma m+sa na sa/ 
106a6(mdo 'grel): lan re ldang // de ni sha yi rtsa la brten// gsum pa tshil gyi rtsa la gnas// mkhris pa rlung gnyis spyi nas 'dzin// bad kan mkhris 'gyur sum mngon// rlung dang bad kan rgyab nas 'dzin// de ni zhag gcig gis chod yin// nyin bzhi pa rims 
106a7(mdo 'grel): nad tshil dang // rkang dang rus pa'i nang na gnas// gzhan dag tshil nyid la gnas zer// de yi nus pa bstan pa ni// bad kan gyis ni byin gnyis na// rlung gis klad pa na bar byed// rus rkang gnyis kar zhugs pa yi// nyin bzhi pa ni go 
106a8(mdo 'grel): bzlog pa'o// nyin gsum pas ni nyin gnyis na// nyin gcig na bar mi byed do// nad rnams kyi ni stobs che chung // zas dang spyod pa las byung zhing // de bzhin rims rnams 'byung ba ni// yid dang las las skye bar 'gyur// nad kyis 
106b1(mdo 'grel): las zungs dgrags kyur pa// nad sas te tshe zla bar 'gyur// de tshe nad pa dbugs drag rdul// 'khrun zhing smon byed 'dre ba dang // lus 'dar tshig mang tsha ba dang // lus drang bzhin mdog nyams pa dang // dran stong rims/ 
106b2(mdo 'grel): kyis shugs kyis gzong // khros pa'i tshul gyis lta ba dang // bshang ba nad dang sbyar bcas pa// sru ba shugs drag 'byung ba yin// lus ni yang zhing rgya dang rmongs bag tshab med// kha na thor bu 'byung dang dbang ba rtas shi 
106b3(mdo 'grel): bde// yid ni song gnas rdul snying bder 'byung yig 'byud// mag ba g.ya' ba mas nad 'byung ba'i mtshan ma yin// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// nad gzhi'i gnas kyil khri gnyis pa'o//

106b5(mdo 'grel): gsheng dang thag rdzas nad du 'gyur// de ni phan tshun 'dres gyur pas// lus kun khyab par byed par 'gyur// mchis pa zag las byung ba dang // 'dres dang gnad bya las dang ga cig/ mdog dang drani rjes mthun pas// zags 
106b6(mdo 'grel): med du bstan pa yin// da ni zag gnas mtshan pa dang // mtshar ba las ni 'byung bar 'gyur// mgo ba lta gang yig 'chus// bsil 'dod sgeg padud can sbyar// skrag cing sdug mdog gcog par snang // lung pa dbugs ma

107a1(mdo 'grel): mchog ni bcu sman yin// zla la yod pa'i bad kan yang // der ni de yis sbyangs byas 'gyur// de la sI mngar dang bsgru ba// bad kan dag la phan pa la// gang ldog rang gis bad kan sel// kha dang bskab 
107a2(mdo 'grel): smos ci dgos// thur du 'byung ba'i rlung yin phyir// de ni skrag sman btang bas gso// mkhris pa'i sman ni nyung ba yin// sdug sman mkhris pa'i sman mchog yin// rtsal yod pa'i rlung nad kyang // de ni de yis zhi mi 'gyur// 
107a3(mdo 'grel): de la ro ni mngar bskab// 'ba' zhig phan par 'gyur ba yin// bad kan rlung ni 'dres pa'i nad// gnyi gar 'byung ba gas dka' ste// bzlog pa'i thabs ni med phyir dang // sman yang yod pa ma yin no// 'di las bzlog par 
107a4(mdo 'grel): bya ba'i thabs// sbyangs pa 'am yod pa ma yin te// sbyangs pas bzlog par bya ba dag/ sman pas khrag mkhris gso ba yin// de bzhin nye bar zhi pa yang // 'di la yod ye yod ma yin// 'dres par gyur pa'i nad la ni//

107b4(mdo 'grel): dang // lud pa'i shugs kyi rgyun 'byung ba// skar mda' 'phro ba lta bur snang // bad kan las brang na tshabs chung // mgo lci snying ga gang snyam sems// the bar bskus 'dra snyoms par byed// cham 'debs zas stug yi ga 'chus//

107b6(mdo 'grel): te lu pa lu bar byed// des ni bad kan khrag bcas dang // ser zhing gnag la skams pa dang // ril ril po mnam mang du 'byung // 'byung tshe gre ba na ba dang // zang ni dpral ba snyam du sems// khab ni rnon pos phug snyam sems//

111a2(mdo 'grel): snyoms rims yig 'chus// nyes gsum mtshan nyid thams cad ldan// srin pus mig ni gnag pa dang // mun par zhugs snyam byed snying 'phar// lus bskams g.ya' zhing bad kan 'dzag/ 'di ni rtag tu sog la yis// 
111a3(mdo 'grel): snying la 'dud pa lta bur sems// mi bzad nad des myur gsod pas// de ni rings par gso bar bya// skom dang rlung mkhris bad kan dang // 'dus pa dang sa ma zad pa dang // nad 'dres pa las drug tu 'gyur// de ltar gyur pa thams cad 
111a4(mdo 'grel): la// rlung mkhris gnyis ni rgyu yin te// de 'khrugs lus zungs bsil ba ni// bskams nas ldang bar 'gyur ba yin// lus kun 'dang zhing mgo 'khor tsha// skom dang khong tsha rmongs par byed// lce drung mgul pa glo ba dang // skam dang skom 
111a5(mdo 'grel): 'jung ba'in// bsnams pas skam dang skyid par 'gyur// de rnams kyi ni spyi'i mtshan nyig// kha bskams skom gyis mo ngoms dang // zlas la mi dga' skad 'gags dang // grib lce mchu chub med 'gyur// lce 'byin byed cing khong snyam 
111a6(mdo 'grel): la// gla zhing sems ni myos pa dang // de bzhin skom gdungs nad du 'gyur// lus bskams rgyu zhing 'on pa dang // rmong bag mgo 'khor snying nad ste// 'di lta bu yi nad rnams ni// skom pas gdungs las skye bar 'gyur// rlung 'gyur khong 
111a7(mdo 'grel): rgya nyam chung la// mur 'gram zug cing klad pa 'khor// sna lces dri dang ro mi tshor// 'on zhing gnyid med nyams stobs zad// chu grang 'thungs na skam 'phel 'gyur// mkhris pa kha nang ro kha brgyal// dmar por mthong zhing rtag par ni/ 
111a8(mdo 'grel): kha skam khong tsha dbugs mnam pa'o// bad kan ldan pas skom rgyu'i rtsa// bkag pas rlung ni 'khrugs gyur nas// de tshe de yis bad kan ni// 'dam bzhin de yis skom par byed// mgul pa grams gang snyam sems// gnyid che 
111b1(mdo 'grel): nang mang rab po// stob mgo ba tshang ba chung // rmongs bag sngon gyur yi ga 'chus// lus skom kha zas mi 'juba'o// kun las gyur pa rtags kun ldan// be snabs las gyur kha zas ni// mid dka' rlung mkhris las gyur yin// tshabs 
111b2(mdo 'grel): ngal bas 'phral du na// chu grang bsten gyur skom dang che// khong bar tsha ba bsdus pa yis// gang skom de ni mkhris skyes yin// gang yang chang drags me drod no// snum zos skyes pa'ang mkhris 'byung yin// snum zhing skur dang lan tsha'i bkra/ 
111b3(mdo 'grel): zos pas bad kan las skyes 'gyur// za byed las ni skom dad 'gyur// dngas ma zad dang mtshan nyid 'dra// khong bskams gcin nad rims nad sogs// yun rings nad ni rims skom nad// gang zhig skam dad mi bzad skyes// de ni 
111b4(mdo 'grel): 'dres las 'byung bar bshad// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// nad gni'i gnas kyi le'u lnga ba'o// / de nas chang nad kyi nad gzhi bshad par bya// rno dang drod che nub pra sbyar// zhal po 'dod myur byed dang yang / 
111b5(mdo 'grel): gsal dang dang bar byed par bshad// mdangs ni 'di las go bzlog yon// dug kyang rno sogs yin mod kyi// sems la gnod par byed pa yi// nus pas 'chi bar byed pas na// dug ni lhag par mthu bo che'o// tshang ni rna sogs yon ta/ 
111b6(mdo 'grel): gyis// mdangs kyi yon tan brtul la sogs// bcu po bcu yis 'khrugs byas nas// sems ni skur bar byed pa yin// ra ro dang po gnyis pa yis// bag med pa yi gnas la gnas// rnam rtog ngan bcom rmongs pa rnams// 
111b7(mdo 'grel): bde ba yin snyam sems par 'gyur// 'bring dang chen po bar gyi tshe// rdul dang mun pa'i rang bzhin can// glang chen lcags kyu med pa ltar// rmongs pas mi bya ci yang med// 'di ni kha na mtho'i gnas// 'di ni tshul khrims 'chal pa'i gzhi/ 
111b8(mdo 'grel): 'di gcig ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i lam// mang po ston par byed pa yin// ra ro gsum pa'i tshe na ni// sems med par ni ro ltang nyal// nyes pa'i bdag nyid shi ba las// shin tu ma rung gnas skabs 'thob// chos dang chos min bde dang sdug 
112a1(mdo 'grel): don dang don min phan dang gnod// gang la chags pas mi shes pa// de ltar mkhas pas ji ltar bsnyen// chang las myos 'jigs mya ngan dang // khro dang srog dang bral ba gnas// skye byed myos dang brgyal bar byas// brjed byed dang 
112a2(mdo 'grel): bcas kun song nad// gang du dran pa nyams cig yod// der ni mi dge thams cad 'byung // mi 'phrod zas ni zos pas kyang // nad dam yang na 'chi bar 'gyur// char ni sde tshan gsum zlo brtan// ngo tsha sogs kyang 'jig par byed// 
112a3(mdo 'grel): nyams stobs ldan dang zas zos dang // zas cher za dang snum pa ga za// snying stobs lang tsho ldan pa yin// rtag tu char 'thung de'i rigs skyes// tshil dang bad kanags chel// rlung dang mkhris pa'i shas chung dang // me drod che zhing bstan pa 
112a4(mdo 'grel): rnams// shas che rar ror mi 'gyur ro// de las bzlog pa chang dad can// bres dang chang rtsub sbyar shas che// ma nur bcas dang ma 'thungs pa// gang yin shas cher ra ror 'gyur// rlung mkhris pad kan kun las 'byung // char nad rnam pa bzhir 'gyur 
112a5(mdo 'grel): ro// kun kyang kun las skyes mod kyi// shas che ba las ming du btags// de rnams kyi ni spyi mtshan nyid// rmongs dang snying ni na ba dang // 'khru zhing rtag tu skom dad che// tsha grang rims 'debs yi ga' chus// mgo bo rtsi ba rus na dang 'dar// gnad 
112a6(mdo 'grel): 'jig ltag pa na ba dang // brla rengs rab rib khyer ba dang // lud pa dbugs mi bde gnyid med// rdul cher 'byung zhing bshang ba 'gags// skad shing sems ni 'khrul pa dang // gla zhing smon par byed pa dang // mgo 'khor rmi lam ngan pa mthong ba'o// 
112a7(mdo 'grel): rlung gyur khyad par gnyid mi 'ong // dbugs mi bde zhing grad na 'dar// rmi lam du ni 'phyan zhing 'phur// gshin po rnams dang gtan smra rmi// mkhris las lus tsha skad 'gags dang // rmongs pag tshe 'bru skom mgo 'khor// lus mdog ljang dang 
112a8(mdo 'grel): sor ba dang // mig dang mkhur tshos dmar bar 'gyur// bad kan gyis smon snying na dang // gnyid che grang 'dar yan lag lci// kun skyes mtshan nyid kun dang ldan// chang spangs pa las 'phral du ni// mang du 'thung ngam ma gems 'thung // de las 'joms/ 
112b1(mdo 'grel): dang lus skam nad// rlung las sdug bsngal ldan pa 'byung // nyams chung ba las mchog tu 'byung // 'joms pas bad kan mchil ma mang // lkog ma bskams shing gnyid rab che// sgra drag mi bzod blong bag 'gyur// lus bskams yan/ 
112b2(mdo 'grel): lag mgo rab na// snying dang mgul nad rmongs pag dang // lud pa skom dang smon rims 'debs// gang zhig chang rnams spangs pas ni// dbang po thul zhing brtags te byed// nam yang de la lus sems kyi// skyen rnams 'byung bar mi 
112b3(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro// rdul dang mun pa mi 'phrod zas// mchog tu bsten nas nad gsum 'byung // dngas ma khrag dang semasu rgyu ba'i// rtsa sbubs bkag pa las byung ba// myos dang brgyal dang kun song nas// phyi ma bzhin du stobs rab che// 
112b4(mdo 'grel): 'dir myos nad sna re re kun// khrag chang dug rnams las kyang 'byung // rlung las gtam las chags pa dang // mang smra nyur smra spyod pa 'khrul// lus ni nub gnag dmar ba yi// myos pa rlung las skyes pa yin// mkhris pa las khro dmar 
112b5(mdo 'grel): ba dang // ser por snang zhing rtsod la dgrab// bad kan tshig nyung 'brel smra sgra// sems las che zhing le lo che// 'dus pa mtshan nyid kun dang ldan// khrag las mig dang yan lag rengs// mkhris pa'i mtshan nyid ldan par 'gyur// chang gis 
112b6(mdo 'grel): yan lag skad spyod 'gyur// dug gis 'dar zhing gnyid rab che// de ni kun las myos tshabs che// khrag sogs pa yis rlung sogs pa'i// mtshan nyid lhag par shes par bya// brgyal ba rlung gi bdag nyid can// nam mkha' dmar sngo gnag 
112b7(mdo 'grel): par ni// mthong zhing mun par zhugs snyam sems// myur du sangs par byed pa dang // snying na 'dar zhing mgo 'khor la// skam zhing bzhin mdog dmar nag 'gyur// mkhris pas dmar ba'im ser por ni// na mkha' mthong zhing mun 'thibs 
112b8(mdo 'grel): byed// sangs nas rdul dang bcas pa dang // tsha skom gdungs pas nyen pa dang // 'khru zhing kha dog ser dang dmar// mig dmar ser bar snang bar 'gyur// bad kan gyis ni sprin lta bur// na mkha' mthong zhing mun 'thibs byed/ 
113a1(mdo 'grel): ring nas sangs par 'gyur ba dang // snying na bcas par mchil ma mang // pags pa rlon pas g.yogs pa bzhin// yan lag lci ning tshor ba chung // nyes pa gsum gyis mtshan kun ldan// brjed byed gnyis pa lta bu ste// myung du/ 
113a2(mdo 'grel): 'gyel zhing brgyal 'gyur te// 'jigs rung spyod pa med pa yin// lus can mos dang brgyal ba'i nad// la shugs yod par gyur kyang ni// rang nyid zhi bar 'gyur ba yin// kun zhugs sman med par mi ni// nad ni shin tu stobs tshal// 'dus pa 
113a3(mdo 'grel): las gyur kun zhugs pa// srog gi nas la brten pa yis// lus dang ngag gis spyod pa 'brog/ de yis skyes bu ro dang ni// shing dang rtsig par 'dra bar byed// rings par gso bar ma byas na// myur du 'chi bar byed pa yin// mtsho thab chu srin mang 
113a4(mdo 'grel): pocan// chu brjer 'jug ngogs med par ni// kun zhugs pa yis nub byed pa// ma ne myur du gnod par bya// rigs pas brten dang bral ba'i char 'thungs pas// byos drags khro dang bral ba'i rang bzhin can// rang gi dgra bos yongs su 'khrung gyur 
113a5(mdo 'grel): zhing // rigs dang mi rigs mnyam par byed par 'gyur// stobs dang dus dang yul dang goms pa dang // rang bzhin grogs dang na tshod nad rnams pa// legs brtags de dang rjes mthun gang shig 'thung // de ni bdud rtsi 'thung dang mtshungs pa 
113a6(mdo 'grel): yin// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// nad ga zhi'i gnas kyi le'u drug pa'o// // de nas gnang 'brum gyi nad ga ni bshad par bya'o// dgra ltar srog chags rnams kyi tshe// gzhang 'brum 'byung bas gsod byed pas// de bying
113a7(mdo 'grel): bshad pa'i lam 'gegs pa// gzhang 'brum zhes ni bshad pa yin// nad kyis pags tshigs sha rnams ni// gnod byed dbyibs ni sna tshogs pa'i// sha yi myu gu gzhang sogs sa// skyes te gzhang 'brum yin par bshad// lhan cig/ 
113a8(mdo 'grel): skyes dang byis 'byung dang // skam dang khrag tu 'dzag pa yi// dbye bas mdor na rnam gnyis yin// gzhang ni rgyu ma sbom por brten// sor ni phyed dang lnga yod der// gnyer gsum sor ni byed dang gnyis// rim pa de yi nang ma ni// phyir 'phul 
113b1(mdo 'grel): b.ram sel ba yin// de yi phyi rol 'dzums pa yin// de yi phyi ro la sor cig la// nas ni phye dang gnyis kyis tshad// de ban chad ni swa skye 'gyur// de la lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyu// gnyer ma'i sa bon gnod 'gyur nyid// gzhang 'brum sa bon 
113b2(mdo 'grel): gnod pa yang // phams mi bzod zos pa dang // sngan las de gnyis dang 'dus pa// 'khrugs pa las gyur da dag ni// gas mi rung ba nyid du bshad// rigs 'byung na kun de dang 'dra// lhan cig skyes pa khyad par du// rtsub cing ltab 
113b3(mdo 'grel): dka' ba dang // nang dul bltas dkar ba dang // tha gzhan mi bzod can gas dka'// cig shos drug sten dpa dang // 'dres dang 'dus pa khrag las byung // rlung dang bad kan gnyis las skam// khrag dang mkhris pa las rlan can// nad rnams 
113b4(mdo 'grel): lda n+d+ha lngar bshad pa// 'khrugs pas de yis khang pa yi// me drod nyams shing bshang ba 'bal// gzhan yang zhal po rab drags dang // gzhon pas/ dkrugs sun dag ni// ma skams sa dang tsag pur 'dug/ 'jam rtsi'i gce'us 
113b5(mdo 'grel): dang ni// rdo dang gos kyis drud pa dang // shin tu grang ba'i chus bkrus dang // rtag tu 'khru bar byed pa dang // bshang dang gci dang phyen gyi shugs// bkag dang nan gyis btsir ba dang // rims dang sman dang tshad par 'khru// 'or nad sgra zab be snabs 
113b6(mdo 'grel): kyis// skem byas gnod par 'gyur ba yi// spyod pa bsten las gnod par 'gyur// bud med zla grangs mtshang 'byil// zla ba rdzogs pas gzing las byung // de 'dra ba dang gzhan yang rlung // thung ser 'khrugs pas dri ma ni// gan gyi 
113b7(mdo 'grel): gnyer mar de bzhag pas// don mi mngon gyu bar gnas// gnang 'brum 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin// de yi sngon tshul me drad nyams// rla ni rings shing na ba dang // byin pa'i nyan mgo la khor zhing // yan lagan nying mig gnyis spang // bshang/ 
113b8(mdo 'grel): ba'akhruba'am yang na sri// rlung chen nang na 'khyil ba dang // phal che bsde ba'i 'ogan tu// nad bcas bcad pa lta bur sems// rkang par 'byung zhing sgra gcan 'byung // num gul grul ze shing so// skem ning sdigs pa mang du 'byung // 
114a1(mdo 'grel): gcin mang bshang nyung yig 'chus// sgregs pa dud 'drar skur ba 'byung // mgo dang brang dang rgyab tu gzer// skom zhing kha dog zhams pa dang // blong bag dbang po nyam chung la// khro zhing bsnyen bkur bka' ba dang // mazhu 
114a2(mdo 'grel): skem nad sbya rba ba dang // dmu rdzing rnams la sa ma skye// gzhung 'brum skyes par gyur pa la// 'di dag nyid ni 'phel bar 'gyur// de yis 'og gi lam bkag pas// thur du sel ba'i rlung lag ste// lus dang dbang po kun gnas 
114a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i// rlung gzhan thams cad 'khrugs par byed// de bzhin gshang gci mkhris pa dang // bad kan lus zungs brten bcas pa// 'khrug cing ma drod nyams par byed// de nas gzhang 'brum nad can la// phal char thams cad nyer 
114a4(mdo 'grel): 'byung ba// skem zhing mchog tu bskyod mi nus// stobs zad khong rgya bzhin mdangs nyams// lud lhod snying po med 'gyur zhing // 'bru zos pa yi shing 'dra la// bla gzhan ma lus dag gis 'debs// ji skad gshad pa'i nad gzer 
114a5(mdo 'grel): zhing // lud bskom dang skad 'gags dang // kha ro mtshir cham 'debs spo// sgyid sbyar rkang lag na zhing smon// sbrid pa skrangs dang rims nad dang // khu ba zad cing rab rib smon// rde'u chags nad kyis gzer ba dang // skad 'gags 
114a6(mdo 'grel): ma la sems khong chud// mtshal ma mang 'dor yi ga 'chus// dus tshigs kun dang snying lta ba// gnang dang sna rtsa gzer dang bcas// gzhang nad 'bru ni ma smin btsos// khu ba lta bu'i sbyin pag 'dzag/ rdug skam gci ba 'am sra bar 
114a7(mdo 'grel): 'khru// smin dang ma smin bar bar 'khru// sgra zhing ser dang sngon po yi// khrag ni sprin pag 'khru bar 'gyur// gzhang 'brum rlung shas che las gyur// skam zhing cog cog tsha ba dang // rnyed cing dmar nag rengs pa dang // maM snyoms rtsub cing 
114a8(mdo 'grel): srab dang // phan tshun mi 'dra yo ba dang // rtse me rno zhing gas pa dang // bim+ba rgya shugaso kha rdu ra// ras bal sa bon dang 'dra zhing // la la ka ta me tog 'dra// la la yungs kar lta bur skye// mgo dang phrag pa rtsib logs brla// chus dag tu 
114b1(mdo 'grel): lhag par na// sbrid bsgeg pa bshang ba sri// snying 'phar yig 'chus par bskyed// lung dbugs mi bde me drod nyams// rna ba sgra bcas mgo 'khor byed// des nyes tug skam nyung ngu ni// sgra bcas bska sla 'dren ma dang // na zhing dbub 
114b2(mdo 'grel): 'byar bag can// rdug skam tshul gyis 'byung bar 'gyur// pags pa sems mo bshang gci dang // mig dang gdong ni gnag par 'gyur// sman dang mtshar ba dmu rdzing dang // dun 'dra de nyid las byung 'gyur// mkhris shas che las 
114b3(mdo 'grel): rtse mo ni// sngo zhing dmar ser dkar bar snang // 'phra zhing dri mnam khrag sla 'dzag/ srab cing 'jam la lhod pa yin// mcher pa'i dum bu ne co lce// srin bu pad+ma'i mchu 'drar snang // tsha zhing gnags la rims dang rdul// skom dang yi ga 'chus rmongs 
114b4(mdo 'grel): bskyed// bshang dro sla zhing sbo la tsha// ser zhing dmar bar 'khru bar 'gyur// nas rul nang 'dra pags pa dang // sen sogs sngo ser ldang bar 'gyur// bad kan shas cha rtsa ba sbom// mthug cing nad kyi shugs dal dkar// spang zhing rgyas la/ 
114b5(mdo 'grel): snum pa dang // 'greng zhing snum la lci zhing brtan// 'byar bag tshor ba chung zhing 'jam// g.ya' zhing reg na dga' bar byed// ka ri ra pa na sa yi// rus pa ba yi nu sor 'dra// chu sor zug cing sbom gzhang na// lte ba lgang pa bcad snyam sems// 
114b6(mdo 'grel): lud pa dbugs mi bde spring na// mchil mtsham 'debs yig 'chus// gcin sri mgo bo tsher ba med// grang ba'i rims ni skyed par byed// khu chu 'dzag cing me drod nyams// smon zhing ma zhu'i nad kun bskyed// bshang ba tshil 'dra bad kan 
114b7(mdo 'grel): mang // 'khru dang bcas par 'byung bar 'gyur// 'dzag par mi byed rdol mi byed// pags pa la sogs snum zhing dkar// 'dres las mtshan nyid 'dren ma yin// 'dus pa mtshan nyin kun dang ldan// khrag shas che las gzhang 'brum ni// 
114b8(mdo 'grel): mkhris pa'i mtshan nyid 'dra ba la// n+ya gro da yi myu gu 'dra// b+hu ru 'o lam sa mdog 'dra// shin tu tsha thon pa dang // bshang ba shugs kyis rab btsir las// 'phral du khrag ni 'byung ba dang // de nyid shin tu 'dzag par 'gyur// sbal ba 'dra 
115a1(mdo 'grel): zhing khrag zad las// byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen gyur// mdog stobs spro ba nyams pa dang // mdangs 'phrog dbang po zhan par 'gyur// mut+ka ko dra ba'i phye ma// tsun ka rir sogs pa// rtsub dang bshang ba sri bas rlung // rang 
115a2(mdo 'grel): gnas 'khrugs pa stobs ldan pas// thur dri rgyu ba'i bug ni// bkag ste smad du rab bskams nas// bshang ba gcib 'phyen rnams ni// 'gags pas nad ni mi bzad bskyed// de yis khong ba rgyab rtsi ba lags// snying gar nad ni shin tu bskyed// 
115a3(mdo 'grel): lto spos gsus pan ba dang // snying cu rgyu ma bcad snyam sems// chu sor shin tu zug pa dang // 'khur ba spangs par 'byung bar 'gyur// rlung na gyen la song gyur na// de las sman rims yig 'chus// snying na be'u skabs mazhu dang // gcan sr-i 
115a4(mdo 'grel): bshang ba 'khru ba dang // 'or dang rab rib dbugs mi bde// mgon lud pa tshams pa 'debs// yid kyis 'gyur bskom dang khrag/ mkhris pa sman dang glu rdzing sogs// rlung gi nad rtags de dang de// shin tu mi bzad 'byung bar 'gyur// gzhang 
115a5(mdo 'grel): 'brum gyen du 'khyil gyur pa// 'di ni mchog tu gnod byed yin// rlung shas che ba'i khong par ni// de med par yang 'byung bar 'gyur// lhan cog skyes dang nad gsum ldan// phugs ma'i gnyer mar gang gnas pa// de dag gsor mi rung 
115a6(mdo 'grel): ba yin// mdzod stobs che sogs kyis 'tsho// 'dres las gyur dang gnyer ma ni// bar mar gnas pa gang yin pa// lo gtsag yan chad lon b+hur bas// de dag gas dka' yin par bshad// phyi rol gnyer mar byung ba dang // nad ga ci 
115a7(mdo 'grel): shas tshe las byung dang // skyes nas ring po ma lon gang // gzhang 'brum de ni gso bas// pho mtshan sogs kyi 'oganas ni// rang rang bskabs bshad lte bar skyes// nA b+hA ba yi kha 'dra zhing // 'byar ba gcan la 'jam pa yin// 
115a8(mdo 'grel): bags pa'i mang ba smras pa ni// bya ba byed kyis ni bad kan bsdus// pags pa'i phyir ro la bor bur byed// 'dzer ba 'dra zhing rngub par gnas// pags pa'i 'dzi ba yin par shes// rlung gis zug cing nub par 'gyur// bam 
115b1(mdo 'grel): papas gnag la dmar rtsar 'gyur// bad kan gyis de sna ma nyid dang // rmen bu mdog dang 'dra bar 'gyur// blo dang ldan pas myur bar ni// 'bad de gzhang 'brum gso bar byed// de yis gzhang ni myur 'gags nas// dmu rdzing nad ni skye bar 'gyur// yan lag 
115b2(mdo 'grel): brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bdun pa'o// de nas tshad par 'khru ba dang po pa'i na dag zhi bshad par bya'o// nad gzhi sA re kun dang ni// 'jigs dang mya ngan las gyur pa'i// tshad par 'khrub rnam drug yin// de na 
115b3(mdo 'grel): chu 'thungs drags pa dang // shi rid sha skam ma goms pa'i// til gyi khu ba ma sman 'khru// chang rtsub kha zas tshod ma zin// gzhang 'brum snum bag drags pa dang // 'bu dang shugs ni bkag las byung // de 'dras rlung ni 'khrugs pa yis// chu 
115b4(mdo 'grel): khams thur du bskyod gyur la// de nyid kyis ni me drod nyams// de 'og khong pa khyab nas ni// bshang ba sla ba nyid dubyed// de ltar tshad 'bru 'byung bar bshad// de yi 'byung 'gyur mtshan ma ni// bshang lam snying ga lte bar zug/ lus snyom bshang bsrib 
115b5(mdo 'grel): dang/ phyogag sabs me 'dra ba'o// de las rlung 'gyur shang nur bcas// rbang shing 'byung zhing gaper smra bcas// bgag cing 'byung bar 'byung ba dang // rtsu ba pa dbu bar bcas pa'am// gang pa yang dang yang du 'byung // de bzhin du sa 
115b6(mdo 'grel): tshig pa dang // sbyin bag bcas shing bcad snyam sems// kha ma nyams gzhang ni snad pa dang // spu langs pa dang 'khru ba yin// mkhris pas ser zhing gnag pa dang // sngon zhing dur pa'i mdog 'dra la// khrag bcas shin tu dra 
115b7(mdo 'grel): mnam pa// skom dad brgyal tsha rdul dang bcas// gzer byas gzhang kha tsha dang bcas// gzhang khar thor bu 'byung ba yin// bad kan las gyur bska ba dang // 'byar bag dkar zhing na la nal po// snum zhing be'u snabs bad kan bcas 
115b8(mdo 'grel): rgyun du 'khru zhing lcil mnam// bska zhing nad rjes 'brang ba dang // gnyid che khong snyom yi ga 'chus// cung zad nyung zad 'khru dang bcas// ba spu rtse zhing klong bcas dang // chu so lto ba gzhang kha l+le// bshangs kyang bshar ba ma btang snyam// kun skyes 
116a1(mdo 'grel): mtshan nyid kun dang ldan// 'jigs pas sems ni 'khrugs gyur pas// rlung gis mkhris bcas bshang ba ni// skra byed de nas 'khru ba ni// tsha zhing skal 'phyo ba dang // mtshan ma rlung mkhris las byung 'dra// mya ngan las byung de dang // 
116a2(mdo 'grel): 'dra// mdor na tshad 'khru rnam gnyis te// ma zhur bcas dang ma zhu med// khrag bcas khrag mod de dang ni// dang po bshang gci chur 'byir 'gyur// dri mnam lto ni spo ba dang // mkhreg cing mchil snabs shin tu mang // smin pa de las bzlog pa yin// 
116a3(mdo 'grel): bad kan smin pa'ang chu nang 'byin// gang zhig tshad 'khru 'bad pa ni// med des pho ba'i nad du 'gyur// me drod nyams par byed pa yi// zas brten pa yis me drod nyams// gang zhig zhu nas bshang ba ni// be snabs bcas dang be snabs med// 'khrub de 
116a4(mdo 'grel): ni tshad 'khru ste// rang bzhin gyis ni myur gsod byed// mazhu kha zas mazhu dang // zhu ba smin pa'ang mi 'khru 'gyur// rgyu med yang dang yang sri ba'ang // rgyu med yang yang sla bar 'gyur// pho bar ma zhu sogs shing 'khru// yun ring na bar byed// 
116a5(mdo 'grel): pa yin// de ni nad sta re re 'dus// las byung rnam pa bzhi yin no// de yi sngon tshul snyom pa dang // ring nas 'ju zhing skar bag 'byung // mchil ma kha yis ro me tshor// rgya skom skom zhing yig 'chus// lto sgo slon ni bro ba dang // rna ba rgyu ma skra/ 
116a6(mdo 'grel): dang bcas// spyi yi mtshan nyid skam pa dang // du ba mun dang rims kyis 'debs// brgyal zhing mgon bshang ba 'gag/ rkang pa lag pa spangs par 'gyur// de la rlung la rkan bskams shing // rab rib rna bar sgra 'byung dang // rtsi ba logs 
116a7(mdo 'grel): brla dang chu sor na// yang yang spo zhing gsung pa dang // ro rnams kun la skam pa dang // bsres skom chum bcad snyam sems// zas zhu nas ni spo ba dang // zas zos nas ni bde bar 'gyur// rlung gi snying nad skan gzhang 'brum// mcher pa 
116a8(mdo 'grel): skyarba ba 'byung bar dogs// bshang ba 'byung dka' ba ska slar 'byung // de yang be snabs sgra can 'byung // bshang ba yang dang yang du 'byung // gzhang na lud pa dbugs mi bde// mkhris pa sngog de sa ra ba dang // ser po sla bag 'khru bar 'gyur//
